ni byo bituma umuntu agera umunsi ntera ndende y’ubupfura.

Niko kubwira umwami  ko atabibasha 
mwana wa, igihe cyose wari kumwe nanjye,
byaba ibitabo cyangwa inyandiko zindi zihariye.
Urebye ko imvura irimo kugwa, wagombye kuguma murugo. 
ishuri ryavutse ibiyobyabwenge bya mint na kristu
arangwa n’umutima wo gutanga nta nyungu agamije. 
abantu bakomeza kwibaza ibibazo byinshi 
biragoye kubisobanura kuko nta gihamya
kwitenge biri mu kwigire kw’Ebenye
bamaze gutahurwa mu Gihugu hose

imiti yabashije kubona ni iya apeti ....
ni bimwe mu bikomeje gutuma abaturage barwara
Kirazira kwangiza umubano mu bantu

nkuko  ibisanzwe ndaza gutahana na Buravo,

kubaza impuguke muri domaine yose mugiye kuvugaho

mu ndorerwamo y’umunyantege nke

bo muri Press One

abona nta na kimwe cya kabiri urwo agakunda ufite.

intanga ngore zigera kuri million ebyiri.

ukareka nk’iminota makumyabiri
Ndashaka kuva hano vuba bishoboka 
’imbebe ndekinywe ngubwe nebi cyene
Ubukwe bwa Safi na Riderman
baba bashobora kugaragaza ubwenge
kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga 
iri  n,ishuri mu mwaka wa kane
ngira ngo biraza kugera aho 
no kwitsamura cyane birayiranga
bifasha ubwirinzi bw’umubiri

zizajya zibimenya zigakurikirana.

no kuba ikenesha abaturage n’izindi ngaruka.

nakomeje kwiga rero ariko niga bigoranye

Inyama y’ifi ibaze n’umunyu
imufasha guhuza indangururamajwi n’ibindi bikoresho
Icyo nikibazo kimwe nshobora kugufasha kubikemura.

bose bavuga ko basezerewe mu bigo ngororamuco 
kiba cyabaye kinshi aho hantu, 
bitarahindura ibara ngo usange byijimye cyane.

nyuma y'igitaramo bakoranye i Gitega

ku buryo umuntu wese uje gukina imikino yacu aba azwi
umwijima, amara, umutima, amagufa, impyiko n’ibindi

turifuza abantu ko bumva uburemere bwicyorezo
abana bakuru  bashobora kumucura umwuka,
jya wirinda kubivuga muri rusange,
ni kimwe no kurota inkoko ituraga imishwi.
iyo ibihe bikubanye bibi ntimuba muri kumwe
uwo nta nshuti imurimo ahubwo ni umunyeshyari.
Abikorera bakiriye bate icyemezo
hamwe n’umugore we Madalena

gusa icyo gihe ubuzima bwabo ntibwari buhagaze neza
bibafasha kunezerwa kandi binafasha n’ubwonko bwabo
Agiye gukinga amadirishya yasize afunguye asanga arafunze.

ni ibyo abaseumunsiru badusigiye kandi tugenderaho:
nimigirire y’Ebenyerwende, .

kugira ngo mbamurikire mu gukangurira

kugebenye ubucucike, kwite kuri kurwenye rutugwukwehene

nibura bikamaramo iminota itanu

bakaba bakongera bakita abana andi mazina

Hoba harigihe huzuye abantu hano  ibaze nawe koko

kenshi hagiye humvikana abantu

mu rwego rwo guhindure imitekerereze yebo n’ibindi.

ikimenyane kizashyirwa ku ruhande

Ingingo ryerekeye gukumire no guhene ibyehe 
Umunsimva ko abandi bagira uruhare mu kwigira kwawe: 
barenga igihumbi banduye iyi ndwara
kuko bisa nko kubashinja ko ari bo bateje akaga
harimo urubuto rw’inanasi
akajyaho akamubwira nabi cyane, 
“Wowe utera mu Birangirwa bya Ntaga
mu maso y’itangazamakuru n’abakunzi be
ku mwanya wa mbere
kunyeganyega inyuma n'inyuma birasanzwe cyane
ikagira uruhare mu bwirinzi bw’umubiri, 
Niyo mpamvu ntemera gahunda yawe. 
nawe ntacyo ubona
bigutunguye ko utari buyabone
ibirango nibura bibiri by’iyo Virus B y’umwijima.
Ni ryari wishyira mu kato
aba baturage bari Abahinde baba muri Amerika
Kubirya cyane bishobora kongera izi ndwara
Pfundikira bimare iminota cumi nitanu
Mbabajwe nuko ntashobora guhura nawe muri iri joro. 
wo mu mujyi wa Wuhan mu Bushinwa,
kugira iyerekwa n’ibindi
hashobora kuba harimo utwo tunyabuzima duto
iruhande y'uko umuryango we ari abantu batishoboye
ni ukwemera agaciro n’akamaro by’ikintu cyiza;
Akora neza cyane kurenza uko ukora ku ishuri. 
Igice cyo hesi ni umuntu hejuru ni ingegi.
ibyo uzi byose wumva ugomba kubivugas

kuko naje kumva ko yagarutse
banki y'abaturage irabaha ikaze

shampiyona zikomeye z'umupira w'amaguru

Uburyo bumwe dushobora kuyimenyeramo 
Kuba utaramenye umuntu ukamukunda 
kurushaho kuganira n’inzego zose
maze, ingo zirashya, inka ziranyagwa.
ibitabo by’inkuru zisekeje 
zikaba zizwiho kurwanya ibishishi,
yavuze ko ari iby’ingenzi cyane
Ndetse n’ibigo by’amashuri n’andi matsinda 
Iyo niyo mpano nziza cyane nabonye. 
menshi yatsindiye ari ibihumbi magana tandatu
Ndarakara  ndongera ndababara bikabije
Iruta America, Ubuhinde, na Mexico
nibyagingenzi gukina imikino y’amahirwe.
Twigishijwe ko Intambara ya Kabiri y'Isi Yose yatangiye mu bihumbi bibiri. 
amafaranga asohoka mu kwezi 
mu byo umugomba, umunsizuza inshingano,
ni umuntu wagaragaje ibimenyetso bya Koronavirusi
kuwa Kabiri taliki cumi neshanu Nzeri
kizwiho kuba gihanamye 
Bamutumaho go umugore we yarabyaye.
kuburyo nzajya ntaha aruko batangiye gukoropa
buri munsi nzajya nza kukureba
Nta bahanzi baratangira kuza kwikopesha
Tariki cumi nimwe z'uku kwezi kwa munani,
nahindutse ikindi kintu ntazi nanjye .
kuko umunsi w’ejo uzaba ufite imihangayiko yawo
Iyo ubukungu bwifashe nabi,
ikanavura aho umuntu yarumwe n’agakoko nk’umubu
bariteguye kuko bari bamaze igihe batabonana
ngo hato bitabwangiza cyane
ibikorwa bijyanye n' ishuri 
nk'uko imibare ya minisiteri y'ubuzima ibigaragaza
Leta zimwe ziri gukora ibishoboka 
ayo akaba ari Cleveland Cavaliers, 
ari gukuza Impano ye yo kuririmba
ubundi njya kumureba uwo muntu
maze birangiye padiri abaha umugisha
babikesheje Filimi z’impinde.
umutekano mu baturanyi Ndetse 
bitabahesha gusa kugera ku byishimo 
Muhora mukumburanye cyane buri gihe
Uzi byinshi kuri mwene se kurusha abandi bose. 
n’ibyo dukora bigaburira ubwonko bwacu
baza gushaka imibereho muri Kigali
ahanini turi inyuma yacu.
ushima impano ye cyane
ko nabonye ataye nabi arabimva se?
Nahitamo gufata tagisi kuruta kugenda. 
Ntiyatinze kumva ayo makuru kuruta uko yatangiye kurira. 
akora urugendo  rw’amasaha nibura atandatu 
cyangwa ikigo cy’urubyiruko kigwegereye,
aho yari amaze iminsi arwariye
umunsizirikana ibikorwa bikorerwa mu masibo.
aho bamwe batangiye kuvuga  ko  barenganyijwe 
ntibigabanijwe kandi mwagombaga kubigabanya
Abategetsi muri Australia batangaje nabo
Ni umunyabwenge cyane, abantu bose baramukunda.

babigira amoko ahamye mubantu
King ndakwemera bimwe bikaze
kugera kuri mirongo itatu n’ine y'amavuko, 
Mike yinjiza amafaranga atari munsi ya magana atatu kumunsi. 
Uko nabyumvise, ntabwo byampaye ikinyuranyo kinini 
Ni amahoro si ibibi, 
Amagerageza abiri y'urwo rukingo 
akicuza ariko ntiyabikozenubundi 
no kubashishikariza gufata imiti uko bikwiriye kugeza igihe irangiriye
ahari hateraniye abaturage b’ako karere ndetse n’aka Rutsiro
iryo eri ryo ryose yifeshishije

kandi mukubona neza mumaso yanyu

bubekwiye umunsiko nebo bereshoboye.

Ati “Hari igihe usanga umubu usigaye ufite ubudahangarwa ku miti imwe

mu mezine beyite, mu migeni bece, 
kuko yarimo yigendera n’amaguru.

byo umunsirwanya inkongi y,umuriro
Urugi ruto rwihishe mu gishyitsi
Ejo hazaba hashyushye kuruta uyu munsi. (belgavox)
Kenshi na kenshi, yagombaga kujya imbona nkubone.

ahasigaye ngasigara nkoresha izi nshya nabonye
biri mu gasafuriya gato gashaje
Ira arasobanura uko igitekerezo cyaje.

mbona afite isoni nyinshi,

inyama ze nazo zitangira kwegerana cyane zikomeza.

Ese umuvandimwe wanshingiye ubucuruzi  we
urwego yari agezeho akiyumva ko atakiruriho.
aka gaciro k’uyu murima ndagashyira mu ruhare rwanjye 
yakoranaga na Clement Ishimwe,
kuri ubu hazamara imyaka myinshi
kirazira kwishyira hejuru yayo
byaba na ngombwa tukaba twahagarika kuba yabasha gukina.
Mu byukuri ntabwo nari niteze kuri wewe. 
kujya gushaka akazi ko kuragira inka
kubyakira byarananiye. Nta kosa yari yakoze
ku bakene leta yabarihiye amwe mu mafaranga y'ikiguzi cyayo
ku nshuro ya mbere Ubuhinde buciye ku bushinwa 
ni ubwoko bunyuranye bwa virus, 
niba ushyiramo ubunyobwa bushyiremo 
abana bafite ubumuga bwo umunsitabona
Uyu muganga abajijwe impamvu batandukanya abarwayi
ubwo yabazwaga abarwanyi batanu ba Kung Fu

ni ukugira ubwenge buke 
nibuka umunsi wa mbere nasomyeho umukobwa.

nguhe imibare ibyerekana neza

n’izindi modoka nyinshi ziri mu muhanda

imibereho y’abitwa abanyamuryango simyiza
muri gahunda y’umuryango ‘Rwanda Legacy of Hope’ washinze n Pasiteri Ntavuka Osée,
umukobwa n’umuryango we 
tuhageze twinjira mu nzu kwa Brendah 
biba byiza kwigisha abana uvangamo n'ibimenyetso
umwarimu wahembwaga ibihumbi ijana namakumyabiri nabitanu
ikofi iburizwamo imbere y’ Ibiryabarezi

mu ndimi zirenga mirongo itanu
ubwo yamuhamagaraga kuri telefoni arira,

abakiriya bawe nabo ufite bazabibona,

byagufasha kuba umuntu usobanutse
Uwo Yesu iheye irobe, egire ngo erushe ebendi guhinge
Bibiliya itanga umurongo ugororotse
Kaminuza barayiga kugeza
Ari atatu  ya ariane ni sawa
bambwiye ko bamujyanye yo ku wa gatatu afite umuriro mwinshi,
aho dufite umutekano, aho dufite Data utwitaho
ubu bagiye gusohoka mu nzu zabo
ahubwo ko ari ukugerageza amahirwe.
Kwita ku bandi bishobora kugabanya umubabaro, 
ku kigero cya mirongo irndwi kwijana
hashize akanya yumva umwana ararize
Hashize iminsi asaba kuvugana na Yudita 
rukagabira amariza abarubagariye.
Kayitare avuga ko uko byamera kose
Bagomba kuba bararangije amashuri yisumbuye, 
turi gucunga nabi bigatuma bigenda bicika.
Kurota uzengurutswe n’inyamaswa 
Akigenda nabo bahita baraza
akura mu muco zo kwiha agaciro
Igipimo wafatira nakikwereka ntakibazo
Tugomba kubahiriza amabwiriza asabwa
Nabifashe nk'ukuri ko azaba umunyamuryango.

Ntabwo ushobora guhita wiyumvisha ko bibaho
bakoze impanuka ikomeye y’imodoka
ndizera y’uko yaboneka kandi nyinshi
bigatuma abana babo batagira amahirwe
hakoreshejwe inzitiramibu n'imiti iyica

aho ayoboreye ruragaragara Rwose
nkuko bigaragazwa n'imibare mishya 
ntabwo ari ugukorera ijisho ahubwo ni 
kurenza kurya mukuru bisaba gushira amanga 
Ubushobozi bw’ababyeyi(purchasing power) bugiye kugabanuka
Kugirango umuntu akure biva kure,
Yavuze ko byose bitameze neza mu ishyingiranwa rye. 
barimo abahanga mu buvuzi,

Uburezi niyo ntwaro y’ubumara bukomeye

Jya umarana igihe n’abantu b’inkoramutima n’abandi bakwitaho.
Umukunzi we ntabwo yigeze ahura nundi muryango we
Yatoranyijwe mu ikipe ya gatatu
none so yabaze ikimasa cy’umushishe
umunsirukongeza aho muri hose,
bakajyanwa muri ibyo bigo bakahamara igihe
Bisaba ubutwari bwinshi kugirango wemere ko wibeshye. 
Yoo mbega ukuntu nshaka imbwa,
Abo wita ko muhuje amoko
nyuma yo kubona ko ashoboye
Ni imvugo zigenda zaduka biturutse ku byamamare 
Izindi nkuru wasoma ukanezerwa
ahubwo ahora akurebera mubibi gusa
uturemangingo twafasha ubwonko kwibuka.

bisengeneza bange nkunda mutarabona imihango ya mbere,
Paul Wallace inzobere mu bujyanama mu buzima 
Nkiri umwana, inzu yacu yasaga nini kuruta ubu. (dr)
Hagati aho ariko uko natahaga nasangaga agiye
aricara ibicuma akaba yabyogeje mu nkoko bitukura
Iyo rero ubona ako ashishikajwe n’iterambere
Ikibazo kibi kuruta uko twabitekerezaga. 
yabwiye Umuseke yahanwe azira kutamenya Icyongereza.
Bashobora no kurya ibyatetswe mu mavuta
mu buryo buteye impungenge.

ku mikino y’amahirwe binyuze kuri internet 
bose basabiye ibihano ababyeyi 
abaturage ba Venezuela batisuzumisha iki cyorezo

urwanishe ukwizera kwawe muri wowe
Bagira aba afashe imbehe atangira guhuha.

rimwe na rimwe ugasanga zigira ingaruka mbi
ni bo bakunda kurwara igituntu

Uzabaze wa mubyeyi wisanzuraho 
ayimazemo imyaka myinshi cyane
kurya igi buri munsi 
mu buryo bwangiza serivisi.
uri gushaka kumenya aho ari ngo mucengane
ku buryo duhura n’abashinzwe amadini 
Tumaze hano amezi atatu ashyira ane, 
byugarije imiryango y’abatuye isi
Ni abana bangahe bavuye mu muhanda
ku bihereranye n’ukuntu inyenyeri zaka.
agomba kuza gushakishamo inyongera.
telephone zo mu bwoko bubiri,
bukomeza gutyo nza umunsibona amanota 
yari amaze iminsi arwaye
areba igipimo ubikoreraho uko kingana
Ibyo bikoresho nkenerwa mu buzima bwa buri munsi
ariko we bitamuhenze cyane
gufata imodoka yawe igatwadwa nundi utazi nikibazo
n’ikoreshwa ry’amafaranga mirongo itanu kwijana
gusome no kwendike burundu,
imirimo itendukenye: inkiko gecece, imihigo

Uyu mutobe wa karoti ntutekwa 
nugukaza ingamba zo kwirinda iki cyorezo
icyizere, umugisha cyangwa umuvumo
Umuyobozi ushinzwe imikoranire n’itangazamakuru 
Hari gikukuru isa n’iyerurutse,
kenshi yumvikanye afata nk’icyoroshye iki cyorezo,
Niba ari kwiyubura mureke abanze agerageze
wayoboye urwo rugamba ari rwo musingi w’instinzi
kuko ariyo ibasha kubonwa na benshi
akamaro, urugero nko muri Nyagatare habaga ½ cy’abantu bose barwaye 
mu bizamini bya Leta mu mashuri y’ubumenyingiro.
ngo ntiyibaza ko kuba barakundanye ari ikibazo
iyo umuntu aketse ko yanduye, 
Fata  pilau masala uyivange na simba mbili
amagara aramirwa ntamerwa), umunsigira isuumunsi 
bigaragaza icumi kwijana by’abantu 
aca mu idirishya ry’imodoka yitura hasi,
kandi n’ibikumisha mu muhogo 
muri resitora no mu kabari
Hambere twagize umugisha Imana itanga iwabu ndetse n’ibwanyu iraturemera 
cyangwa mbere yabyo gato
Umugore ufite ubwenegihugu bw’u Bwongereza 
Imana yanumunsiye umunsire habi hashoboka,
ubuhenzi, ururimi n’emerenge bekoreshe 
ntacyo ukora,kuko uri umunebwe
ushinzwe Itumanaho rigamije Iterambere,
Ikibazo cy’abangavu baterwa inda 
akaga ko kwandura Coronavirus
Ubikoze bigaragara nk’aho ari uburara
ngiye kumenya niba koko ahari mu by’ukuri.
Akamaro k’ibigori ku buzima
Ebenyerwende dukomeje kwimekeze ubwitenge nte kintu
Umwereka ingaruka zo kwitwara nabi 
Nibwo yongeye kuza kutureba
ukayabyaza umusaruro ni ingenzi kurushaho
byaba bikunaniye rukaba urwe
ryetumye heduke bemwe bezifeshishe
Muri ako kanya ni bwo igisasu cyazimye. 
Ntakintu cyingenzi kuruta umurava. 
Umukobwa w’umunyakuri kandi wubaha
Ubwenge bwawe burihe mukobwa?

nkumukozi ku bandi bose kandi ntuzigere uba umugaragu wenyine?
umwana ukiri muto icyo wamugaburira
Nanjye rero ntabwo nzagenda njyenyine,
tuzakomeza kubyihanganira vuba
Magufuli yagennye iminsi itatu yo gushimira Imana
Kuba uri Inyangamugayo yuzuye
zizajya zizanwa n’ishyirwa mu bikorwa  by’umushinga,
rubeshyere ebendi, rurege ebendi 
no gukurira muri Yesu Kirisitu
Iyi kompanyi yo muri California 
igihe ibyo wabirangije ukomeze
Noneho bukeye mu ighe umugore atari mu rugo, 
cyane ko aborozi bakomeye ku muco
Mpisemo gukoresha iyi nyandiko ifunguye
Cristiano Ronaldo ubwo yari afite iyo myaka
bica intege igice cy’ubwonko
indangagaciro na kirazira. Umutwe wa kabiri
nzemera mbeho mbabay rwose
uzashyire mu isekuru ubundi ukuremo umutobe 
Mugenzi we  yanze gukina imikino y’amahirwe,
ibizakorwa nuwo mushinga wawe
Rwasa yamenyekanye ubwo yakinaga filimi
Ibyiza by’igisheke ni byinshi,
Benshi babona ko hakenewe uburyo bushya bwo gutsinda malaria.
Fata terabaýt nkeya
Ikibazo cya Bandora gusa ni uko adafite umwanya uhagije. 
bihuza indangamanota nyinshi zitandukanya umuntu n’undi,
bashoboraga kwadukana virusi nke 
aza kubabwira ko bahava bagaba igitero i Byumba,
kandi nawe akizera ku rugero rwo hejuru.
Marume yarimo arwana n'amagara 
Igihe zahabu yari ifite agaciro gake kuruta ifeza mu Buyapani. 
ahurwa gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina 
Ageze mu kigunda arayibura
yasubiye mubuzima bwo ku muhanda
ntihagire inyandiko yacyo nimwe isigara
utuntu two guterateranya duke
Indyo yuzuye ni ibiribwa nyabyo bihagije,
uburyo radiyo zizicuranga batitaye ku butumwa bubi
rusarikana n’ibindi
abana na nyina bajya hariya n'ibijumba byabiriwe.

kuva mukundana kugera mukoze ubukwe.

uko zizagenda zose zemezwa
yaje kugira uruhare mu kwinjiza abakinnyi

kubikora bisaba bitari agahato

nibura uhumetse urebye abagaragu bawe
Leta ivuga izi ngamba nshya 
mwene muyombano yari hano hashize igihe kitarenze isaha. 
Nyuma y'uko ibihugu byose bibonye makumyabiri kw’ijana
mwene se afite uburambe mubucuruzi kundusha. 
Amara asanzwe cyangwa mu rura runini, 
bashyira n’umukono ku masezerano abigena
‘Nta muntu wemerewe kugaburira inyamaswa muri pariki’.
ibihumbi ijana na mirongo itatu
Ibi bigo biri mu rugendo 
ukamuganiriza ibintu bituma atakurambirwa.
aho bamwe yabatindahaje, ikabatandukanya  n’abo bashakanye,
Hari n’ubwo bakoresha indimu mu kwirinda indwara
Ncika intege igihe cyose ntekereje kuri kiriya kibazo.

indengemenote ne kirezire. Umutwe we kebiri

atari ukubera ko yashakaga kumubabaza
iryo zina ryaraduhezaga cyane.”

ayoboye Isibo y’Iterambere

Bemwe mu beyobozi b’Ubumwe nyerwende
Nibyiza ko utagomba kwiga cyane. 
Umurongo wa gatatu niwo tugenderaho:
Iyo umubwiye utyo uko byagenda kose birahinduka 
yasanze bakonje kandi basuherewe
igituma uzana amazi mu bihaha
amafaranga y’ingendo nangahe ngo nyaguhe 
bwo kutabona giherereye mu Murenge
Rubanda rwumvise iryo jambo abaswere
Habaga ari nko mu rugo rw’umuntu, 
kandi afite akazi kamwinjiriza,
byose bifite agaciro k’amafaranga ibihumbi Magana atanu
agihe kwiga iby’imideri ubu ahetse uru ruganda
Fata igice cya watermelon,
Ababyeyi barasabwa kubaka icyizere hagati yabo
Umutima niwo ubeshejeho umubiri wose
abantu bagiye gushyingiranwa haribyo basabwa 
umunsigira ngo agere umunsiri icyo cyerekezo
aho uburenganzira n'inshingano byo kororoka
mwene se yagarutse umunsi umwe mbere yibyo byari byitezwe. 
washyizweho n’umwanzuro w’Inteko Rusange 
betiteye ku ngeruke bizegire ku bezirebe
Natekereje mubucucu ko agiye kumfasha. 
Ni ibisanzwe ko agomba kumurakarira. 
aho kubigumana nk’urwibutso rubi.
bigaragaza icyuho gikomeye mu burere
U Burunndi nka kimwe mu bihugu bigize Umuryango
bituma mwumva mubanye hafi cyane
zakwemezwa cyangwa zitakwemezwa ko zikora
koko ibirimo ari byo byanditseho
Twabigenza dute kugiarango twirinde gukora mumaso?
Uretse no kuba bigarura icyizere 
Inshuti ye Koffi Guéli yagize ati:Yifujwe n'andi makipe nyuma yo kubona itike
Urubura ruto cyane kuburyo rudashobora kwihanganira uburemere bwawe.
kuba wagira icyo wigira kuri izo nshuti zawe
Muri icyo gihe, yari amwenyura kandi aririmba atuje cyane. 
umwana uri munsi y’imyaka itanu atagomba kurya
muri Nyakanga kuri televiziyo y’igihugu, 
muri Dar-es-Salaam hari "ibyango byinshi" byo kwandura
iyo Vitamine C ikaba ifasha mu kurinda umubiri indwara
Vitamin B gatanu ifasha imikorere myiza y’ubwonko
dukora umuziki ku buryo abanyamahanga baza mu Rwanda
mwene nyirakuru ntabwo yakoze neza mu kizamini cye. 
mu buriri bwacu bwacitsemo kabiri
inyinshi zaherekezwaga no kwibutsa ibyamuranze 
abatangira ingendo mbere y’amasaha yemewe.
Indirimbo yanyuma ibihe byose, inoti yanyuma
wirinde ihohotere iryo eri ryo ryose Umunyerwende
amahirwe  yo gusinyana n’igihugu cyateye imbere
akaba yahindura agafata ibindi
Imibare iragoye kuruta fiziki. (RoyTek)
ifite uburebure bw’iminota makumyabiri
Kuba ndi hano byerekana ko ndi umwere. 
Abashinzwe umutekano mu muhanda
nawugeza n’ubundi ntuzabireke kubikora
ariko ko bitameze neza neza cyo kimwe
yabwiye abitabiriye iyo nama ko kurwanya Malariya biri mu by’ibanze

cyangwa tubivuze mu bundi buryo bworoshye,

agarutse mu rugo ashyira ibishyimbo ku ziko.

bari gukura isomo kuri ibyo
ariko nyina yakomezaga kubimubuza

mu bibitunga biba bikeneye

yari itangiye gufatika no guturwamo n’abantu benshi.

uburezi ni ubw’ebenyerwende ntebwo eri ubw’umuntu

niba ushaka ko icyifuzo cyawe cyakirwa neza

nyamara ntiyibuke indahiro yarahirye murusengero

ahubwo bahabwa uburenganzira

maze zigezeyo zisohoza ubutumwa.

abonye icyakugira umwere yisubiraho

ngo barashe indege ya Habyarimana,
Uyu mugani ugira igihe bawucira 
biba bisaba ko wegera mugenzi wawe
ukunze kwifashishwa mu kwigisha amateka y’u Rwanda,

iyi ni imvugo ikoreshwa cyane,

byatwawe na rubanda bose rubyigabagabanije

mu bice byo mu cyaro byo muri Uganda,
kuko aba yumva aribyo bimumara ipfa
Kuba umubaji ntiyabitekerezagaho cyane

ariko muzehe rugano jya umenya gusaza utanduranije cyane
ariko mu by’ukuri ugasanga nta makuru ahagije bafite kuri iyo ndwara.
hirengagijwe andi yose yatsindiye
bekejye mu kiruhuko neze 
Nasabye data ko Kumiko yiga mu Bushinwa. 
Abonye bamaze kugera kure cyane,
ubwo wubakwaga n’Abarabu bakanahakorera ubucuruzi.
byaba bishingiye ku moko, ku gitsina,
kandi nubwo waba uteganya kubona bitatu
nta cyo bitwaye kuko namenye ko ntashimwa nabose
imibereho, imyifatire n’imibanire n’abandi; 
Umuntu ninyamaswa yonyine itukura. Cyangwa bikenewe.

mu ugerero, mukazi Ibi bigaragarira mu migani nk’iyi:

ni ho biba biteye ubwoba
gusa hari n’ababikora ntibikunde neza cyane
nuko nayo ibigenza uko isanzwe
nabo bakabasaba inkunga.
zikomeye zo umunsirere ebekuru  
imyaka makumyabiri muri ibyo bishyamba,
hari abantu bavukana bashyizwe mu bwoko butandukanye
akamusekera akamuha igihe gihagije cyo gukina na we,

ku ntera abafite ubumuga

abisobanura muri aya magambo

atari yo yafashe icyo cyemezo.

mu gihugu cy’amahanga
uburyo  yafashe icyo cyemezo
mu kurwanya icyo cyorezo harimo no gukangurira abaturage kuryama mu nzitiramibu.
uramenye byibura ingaruka zako 
Bashaka ubuki ubwabo
uri umupilote wigiye mu Bufaransa, 
urabona ko hari ibyo ukwiriye guhindura
mubyo badakunze kubona imuhira 
ni ukwitegereza imirimo itangaje yakoze
zigasimbura ya mata adashobora kunywa.
ukuntu ubwirinzi bw'umubiri burwanya virusi 
bari mu kigero cy'imyaka cumi numunani
angana na triyari imwe y'amadolari,
ni ikungahaye ku binure byinshi, 
dore ko ibihaha n’imbavu bye biba bitarakomera 
Ashobora kukugana avuga nabi
Sinkunda kumva nta mbaraga mfite.

amera nk'ukubiswe n'inkuba 
ansiga mu nzu  ngenyine 
mu gihe cy'amasegonda nibura makumyabiri
abaganga bavuga ko kawa itabuza ibitotsi
ndetse na nyuma y’akazi

kugirango naniyorosora aticwa n’imbeho.

byibuza ngo nishimane n’incuti zanjye.

“dushobora kuzakoreshwa mu bintu byinshi, 
ikinyerwende n’imyemerere mizime.
maze nyuma y’igihe runaka,
Bumwe mu buryo bwo gutuma amazuru afunguka 
bivugwa ko n’ubundi nawe yifashishije iyo imirongo
Ikintu cyose kizabaho kizapfa igihe kimwe. 
hanyuma aba arapfuye
kuko uwukenera urimo gukora inombe ya bya birayi 
ikanasukura amaraso yawe muburyo bwiza
ubusenzwe ebekozi bebo bezwiho kwitwere neze
yavuze ko bamaze amezi ane we n umuryango we
Utekereza ko umaze kurya kangahe umunyenga? 
N’intambara yarananiranye ntabwo uzayitsinda,
yaje kunsanga. Ibirenge bye byarakomeretse 
Hari amatsinda yo kuririmba, 
ni ukuvuga guhera mu mezi atatu
nuko umutima ukahahurira n’ibibazo binyuranye
izazo ziba ziteye neza
hari ibyiyumvo uba ufite, 
n’ebeherenire ubusugire bw’Igihugu, 
Ibi bitabo biroroshye kuruta ibyo bitabo. 
ujye umugendera kure nawe 
Birashoboka ko ushobora kwemeza Bobo kubikora, ariko ndabishidikanya. 
zakinwe zigaragaza ububi bw’ubukoloni,
icyorezo cyateye igihugu cyacu n'isi
"Nafashe imbeho mbi." "Birababaje." 
wegororewe nke mutweresibo w’Indeshyikirwe
Gira ubutwari kandi ukore ibyo tubwirwa
bwo umunsitabona batangiye kwig
nicyo cyatumye yakomeje gushikama ku bakobwa be 
n'iyo yaba ari make
buramenyesha Abanyarwanda bose bifuza kwinjira mu ngabo
mu gihe Ubushinwa bwari bwinjiye mu biruhuko
Tariki ya Mpuzamatorero w’Abakorerabushake nyabo
Ndabona igiye kwaka niwihangane
Yabonye ko bishoboka ko imvura yagwa. 
Bakuyeho imyenda kuri iryo shuri. 
ufite forme nk’iya capati
batanu banduye Corona virus
abo bose ukabigisha mu ishuri rimwe
zigezweho ziganjemo iz’abahanzi nyarwanda
Urabona iyo nyubako ndende hariya, sibyo? 
cyangwa injangwe niyo yamurumye
Ryari izina rya mbere bamuhaye,
uwagira umutima wo kumufasha
abura aho aba n'umugore n'abana be; agumya kuzerera
Bagabe yemera ko Mariya ari we mugore kuri we. 
Icyo ni ikintu cyiza twese twakora 
Birasanzwe ko ubitekereza utyo. 
ndetse imineke izagufasha kurwanya indwara ya Cancer
Ntabwo ari mwiza cyane nka mushiki we.

amukurikiza icumu rimwahuranya mu gihumbi 
Ya beta-carotene iba muri karoti ifasha ubwonko
ntibubura kohereza ibiganza byawe mu maso
hirindwa ibyo bishuko bahura nabyo
Dore ingingo zirindwi zo kwitaho
ubu bwoko bushya bwa coronavirus
ishobora kukugaragariza ko wahombye 
kuko ubu tugeze kuri mirongo itandatu kw’ijana
Yagerageje kumenyesha abantu kuri coronavirus,
Ngaho umugabo, abana ndetse n’abagore
Yubaha Imana n’umugabo we;
ni byo wirirwamo buriya
kabone n’ubwo bajya kurega ku Rwego rw’Umuvunyi
byagenze neza pe ntakibazo cyabayemo.”

Biresebe guse ko Mineduke
aho kubiganiraho ukajya umubwira ibindi
umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe kurwanya malaria.
ateta ate ko byamwkamye
umutima ukunda igihugu n’amaboko 
kandi mushiki we yarambwiye ko azaza, 
Kuki mwene data ashobora kuvuga Igifaransa neza ibaze nawe
Imana izabikora mbigereho isaha n’isaha
ariko ntacyo kubakiraho
Abaturarwanda barasabwa gukurikiza amabwiriza birinda kucyandura.
Hari ikintu cyabaye nkwiye kumenya? 
ndetse no kubakirwa isoko rya Gasiza 
ntizirenge aho zashyizwe zose
abanyarwanda nibakomeza kudohoka barasubira murugo
agakunda kumva indirimbo cyane
zongerera umubiri vitamin A 
Mu mijyi, mu nsisiro no mu mudugudu
tubana mu rugo rumwe
jyana  n’ abandi gusenga muko , 
ibimenyetso by' ubwo burwayi, 
zishobora gutuma imiyoborantanga yifunga

bahagaritse ibikorwa byo gutwara abantu muri rusange
uwaka ruswa avuga ko hari ubundi buryo 
Ibiranga ubumwe mu buzima bwa biranga
Kumushyigikira ni ugukanda kuri link,
tugeraho turakundana anambwira ko ari umusirikare.
Joriji niho nahuriye mumuhanda muri iki gitondo. 
ko uwo muvuduko wagabanutse
Indwara y’igituntu iterwa n’agakoko ka bagiteri
Reka rero tubirebe tugire icyo tubikoraho
Muri iryo jwi ryiza riyunguruye
ushobora gusuzuma neza izo ndwara.

binyuriye gusa mu kureba imirimo y’Imana y’irema
ikaba ishinzwe gukoresha ya nitric oxide
kwirinda amacaumunsibiri, gucunga neza ibya rubanda,

menya ko umuntu aza akugana

umunsiko ababyeyi aribo batuma abana bamenya neza igihugu

akaba ari yo mpamvu tugomba kubyanga 
bose bafite aho bahurira
Nta faranga yari afite, ku buryo atashoboraga kujyana nanjye. 
nta nicyo uzunguka habe na kimwe
Ngo ni byiza kumwigisha nk’umubyeyi we 
abangana na mirongo ikenda kwijana bamaze kuvurwa barakira
Kugufasha kugabanya ibiro byihuse
ntibiva mu bo mwigana biva henshi
kugira ngo bamenye umubare 
imboga amashaza nibindi bikubiyemo girikoze
kikaba gikoreshwa muri za laboratoires
amagambo twaganiriye ubwo yamperekezaga.
Inama nzima nabonye ifasha abari mu bibazo,
Ariko nkomeza kuririmba mu bitaramo
kuko ni umubyeyi w’abana batatu
tukajya mu bigo by’amashuri tukaririmba
biba ari ngombwa ko wegera umuntu 
mu ijambo ritari ryitezwe n’uwo ariwe wese

ku mwana muto biba ari ingenzi
abantu bazongera kuva mu ngo zabo

ubwa Safi bufashe iya mbere

cyangwa urundi rugingo rwiza

Birashoboka ko yaje hano akiri umuhungu. 
Umuco niwo uyobore ebewusengiye mu ruhendo rw’emehenge
ibyo guhora bategereje inkunga.
Buri munyarwanda agomba gukorera umunsi ntego 
kandi nta kibazo na kimwe rutera,
byegereye isi yacu dutuyemo
hongeye kugaragara filimi ziganjemo urikundo

bwagaragaje ko mu myaka cumi nitatu ishize,

bamaze igihe kuri mukuru wanjye uri mu bitaro.
kugeza mu mwaka wa bibiri na cumi
nk’aho umuntu arebera kuri mudasobwa

bishobora no gutwara miliyoni enye

guhemuka, umunsirenganya no kwambura, 
mu buzima bwa buri munsi

amakuru atandukanye kuri Ebola,
irwanya uburwayi bumwe na bumwe bw’umutima,
avuga  ku bijyanye n’ibigo by’imikino y’amahirwe

Turimo rero gushaka abashoramari

uburebure butageze no kuri milimetero imwe

igenga iyo mikino n’ahantu hemewe

mu by'ukuri bari baranabonye

Niba atari ko biri kuki yabaye umunyago
gukomeze gukore ubutebezi ebentu begekurwemo.
ugafata n’ingamba zo kuzagera kubyiza

mu gihe wihaye cyo kuyafata
gusa ibyo turya byose siko bifite umumaro
kabone n’ubwo baba batisize ibyo bintu

bagerwaho n’ingaruka za ruswa
Muzane n’ikimasa cy’umushishe, mukibage,
Indi mpamvu itangwa ngo ni uko abagabo baba berebare
bagahabwa akato gukandagira mu gihugu bashaka
kwigisha ijambo ry’Imana

guca insinga zamashanyarazi gutema amatiyo yamazi

wenda ahari bagabo bagarura akuka.
aho nasanzemo Bruno n’abandi basore

birimo kujya gushaka amajwi mu masoko

[S] Nabwirijwe kuguma inyuma kugirango nshobore kuvugana na  ndeba nayo wenyine. 
duhana imbibi n’igihugu kibyemera 
Waruzi ko biri gushira ku isi
Ndasaba gutandukana nawe kuriyi ngingo. 
Ku ngoma ya Mibambwe I Sekarongoro
mu muco n’indangamanota z’Abanyarwanda
aho nabisobanuye neza
mwene nyina yifuzaga ko muri salade yimbuto zirenze imwe. 
ikizere mu gihe yagitaye cyangwa yihebye

Bigaragara ko wakoze amakosa yubupfu.

Iri niryo shyaka ryatsinze cyane twigeze kugira. 
Ikibazo ni ukuntu ugera mu cyumba cy'uruganiriro
ariko ubumenyi bafite bubafashamo 
Kwihangana ni imbaraga zikomeye
kendi bekendushe cyene
Eminem yarakubiswe agwa muri coma. 
mbiha rubanda rugufi rw’abashumba
u Rwanda ni ahantu heza hashobora kubakiza 
Tukiva mu modoka twakomeje tujya muri salon
ntitwashobora kubona neza inyenyeri. 
mu mudugudu wa Nyenyeri

cy’ebefite ubumuge cye Kevumu,

Umurundi aramwenyura aratangara cyane

ahubwo ni ukwikorera ukagira icyo umarira mugenzi wawe
agutura umujinya yakuye ahandi.
wowe urufite wenyine ehubwo rumurikire benshi
bigabanya umuvuduko w’intanga

Niki kikwemeza neza ko  muka soni adashaka gukina natwe basketball  ibaze nawe koko
Mu by’ukuri twese twemera ibyo tudashobora kubona.
Mu ruzinduko yagiriye mu Rwanda
Ndagukunda kuruta uko nkunda undi muntu uwo ari we wese. 
byiswe Rubyiruko Menya Amateka Yawe
akaba yaguca intege aho kuyikugira
Ntekereza ko icyo atari icyemezo cyubwenge. 
kuko Umwuka w’ubwiza aba kuri mwe
Habimana Dieudonne yaduhamirije ko yiyemeje guca agahigo 
Ibyo byorezo birakingirwa kandi biravurwa bigakira
hanyuma niba koko ari igituntu
wabwira umuntu ari uko ufashe igihangano cye
intungamubiri zikenewe nizo nshaka
Avuga ko agifite ibitsina bibiri yahoranaga agahinda,
Imana yohereza Abamarayika bayo 
Nicyo kintu cya mbere nigeze kuguha. 
avuga ko yafashe icyemezo 
Za farumasi nazo zivuga ko zidafite uyu muti.
ngo abamurikire babone uko bagenda
n’izindi biri mu bwoko bumwe 
Umwijima umira nk'amazi yijimye
Dore impamvu ukwiye kurya indimu buri munsi
bwo gusanga imibu hanze itaragera mu nzu".
avuga ko gutera ivi bikorwa kwinshi,
bitume ebentu bemushime, bemwubehe
ibyo ukenera mu buzima bwa buri munsi,
yugarije ibice bimwe na bimwe by’igihugu, 
muri Nyakanga bibiri namakumyabiri
Dore ingero z’aho Abanyarwanda bakoresha ijambo umutima:
yari afite abakozi magana tatu
Ku bandi bantu bose yaba abagabo cyangwa abagore,
Nishimiye ko amaherezo yaje kwisubiraho. 
k’uburyo wagabanya ibinure mu mubiri 
Umusonga uza igihe uhumetse mu bihaha byawe mikorobe
Muburyo bwo gutekereza kubakunzi bawe
kandi ryuzuye intungamubiri zose ukeneye
Ubu ni burebure kuruta ikindi giti cyose.

yaba ari umureti cg andi masosi

baje kuba mu Rwanda kugira ngo bage batwara izo modoka

n’aho isukari yo wumva ko yakoze uko ubishaka
yetengije iperereze umunsiri uwo mukobwe n’imyitwerire ye.

iyo ugikase bifasha mu gutunganya umwuka

cy’igihugu gishinzwe ubucukuzi

ko n’ubwo amafaranga bongerewe ari makeya

Nasomye ibitabo amagana
uko abashyitsi bari buze kubasura bakababona,
bitewe n’uko umubiri we wahise utwikwa
Iyo abantu bavuwe uko bikwiriye bashobora gukira
bituma mugenzi we atekereza cyane 
nawe ntacyo ubona, kwitanga kandi biri mu murage
ariko utamushyize mu kaga.
kandi numva mfite ishema
ndetse n'ukwiyongera k'ubushyuhe ku isi, 
bari gukurikiranirwa hafi n’abaganga.
bityo bigatuma amakuru adahererekanywa neza
izo mbabazi ntacyo ziba zivuze.
Hejuru y'ibi, urarenzaho icyi
yaba umuntu ku giti cye, n’abari mu tsinda.
kubona uburenganzira busesuye,
Yitegereje isaha ye abona ko hashize saa tanu. 
nange numva ko ndi umugore wa viziyo.
Ubu buryo bushya bwo kuburira abantu nibwiza
hari gushakishwa abandi baba barahuye nabo 
cyangwa hari ibimubabaje cyane
kugira impamyabumenyi zihanitse.
iyo mu isoko umuntu yanduye bituma isoko ryose rifungwa
bumva ko basaba ariko bakagira uruhare mu bibakorerwa.

njyee nawe turahuza ubuzima

nta kindi kintu uri gukora ku ruhande
i birakwiriye rwosekubaho

Indangagaciro z’umuco w’u Rwanda “
n'imibereho mu Rwanda rwose
Vitamini B kabiri ifasha mu ikorwa ry’ingufu umubiri ukoresha,
Kirabiranya ku ndwara ya Malariya 
Muri pariki harimo ahantu heza, 
ubumwe, ubwiyunge no gukundana,
Ibi bishobora kuvuga ko byagusaba gusubira ishuri, 
iyo ubonye ubishyuriye amashuri,
Uvugwa muri iyo mikarago ni Mibamwbe I Sekarongoro I Mutabazi 
hamwe na bagenzi be, 
Igitekerezo cy'uko amafaranga ashobora kugura byose ni bibi. 
zigahesha ishema Igihugu.
Yabaze ko bizamutwara amadorari ijana. 
Li Wenliang yanduye iyo virusi 
ku buryo butunguranye kandi bwihuse.
Ururondwe rw'ingore rushobora kubaho
Hari abantu bo mu turere tw'izindi ntara twegereye
ndetse nkumbura abantu. Nanjye
Niwongera gushaka kuruka fata ibiyiko bibiri 
umutobe wa karoti uzagufasha kuzamura ubudahangarwa bw’umubiri
Nahitamo kuguma murugo kuruta kugenda njyenyine. (keira_n)
Indangamanota z’umuco w’u Burunndi nyazo.
no gusuzuma indwara, urugero nka kanseri.
bitewe n’inyungu ze bwite 
mu minsi yashize ntaho wahuye n’ikibazo
Icyorezo cya Coronavirus, cyatangiye kumvikana 
Isabukuru yanjye y'amavuko yaranzwe n'abadayimoni 
ku ishuri cyangwa se bakayahabwa n’abandi
Agasinda cyane maze icyubahiro aragita
kubera gushaka kwiyorohereza ibisabwa, 
umuntu arikoresha ashaka kwerekana ko atitaye ku kintu 
“urarota izuba riva ntakurambirijeho
mu rwego rwo kugabanya ikwirakwira ry’ubwandu.
Yongeyeho mu ibaruwa ye ko azongera kwandika vuba. 
Polisi yaguye gitumo umugabo wari utetse kanyanga,
Nundekere wenyine kugirango nsinzire. 
y’uko ikirombe gicukurwemo emebuye
Ni byiza ko wereka umukunzi wawe
bitaguha intungamubiri zose umubiri ukeneye,
Ebenyerwende bezi ko Yesu iregire 
Abanyeshuri ntibashimiswa na mwarimu 
Yakomeje agaragaza hamwe 
Mama erega yaraye ampamagaye.”
inasaba abajyayo kwitwararika bakubahiriza amabwiriza 
aribwo yabonye ko akwiriye kwihangira umurimo
ariko uwo mushongi ntuwumena 
mureba kure yavuze ibirenze ibyo yashakaga. 
cyane cyane iturutse muri Uganda
amateka yabo n’ibibakikije.
Umwana akenshi mu mwaka we wa mbere
kugira ngo ushobore gutakaza ibiro 
imana iboneka muri Matayo 
Umwami ati ibyo na byo ntibinaniranye nibabigire”.
bisobenuye ko heri byinshi
wenda niba waramusanze iwabo hindura
Bitaba ibyo nabyo bikazakurushya hanyuma
Byegeregeye ko gehunde zishingiye 
akenshi usanga bihenze ku buryo bukabije
Umugore wagiraga inyota akirinda kunywa amazi 
Ageze hanze abona ibiti 
turi mu munsi iheruke yenditse umunsi iteriki ye mbere. 
yavuze ko yari "umukinnyi ukomeye wari ufite ejo hazaza heza mu mupira w'amaguru".
Icyo bisaba ni ukubikunda ndetse no kubishaka gusa”.
nyuma y'ibi byemezo byafashwe
Ella yakomeje avuga ko atazataha 
Rwitsibagura ati mwareka nkababarira ye 
ubukungu bw’igihugu busubira inyuma 
mu masoko hari izo bacuruza ziseye 
urugwiro, ubwuzu, ishyaka, ishema, kwicisha bu fi
Twishimiye iki gikorwe twekorege
Leta y'u Rwanda yaburiye abaturage 
ibyo byiciro biba bipanze muri rusange
umuganga  ukomeye mu bijyanye no kuvura umutima.
yawo hamwe n’inyungu zawo bwite
aba akeneye imirongo migari 
Ni iki iyi si yakoze mu mutima wanjye?
Ntabwo nigeze ntekereza ko  muka soni ashobora kuvuga igifaransa neza. 
Avuga rwose nta soni 
kurusha uko isi ishobora kuwusimbuza undi mushya
ngo niyo ifite icyaha cyo kwirengagiza abaturage
basanganirwa n'ibiciro by’ingendo byazamutse
zerekeza mu bice bitandukanye by’umubiri”.
urakabyara ubyaje inka, gira umugisha, urakagwira,
nka litiro eshatu z’amazi
bamaze kwicwa n'iki cyorezo cya coronavirus 
guhemuka, kurenganya no kwambura, 
Wowe wa gicucu we kigwari, kuki wakunda umuntu? "
Fata inyama uzikatemo uduce turinganiye
ni uumunsigire uruhurirene rw’ingeso nzize
kuko ntuzava muri iryo shyamba
cyangwa wonsa cyangwa se urwaye kanseri y’ibere
Ubuzima busa nigitabo kenshi kuruta ibitabo bisa nubuzima.
kugira ngo bamenye uko bakurikirana abana.
Nari naribagiwe ko namusanze hashize imyaka myinshi. 
ukomeze udutegurire inyigisho nyinshi nk'izi ku muryango,
adutega amatwi akaduha akanya 
bakajya no mu miryango yabo 
ubushobozi ababyeyi be bari bafite

nubwo iminsi yose idahwana.

ifata abantu benshi kurusha izindi ndwara zo mu mutwe
abantu baziguyemwo ari benshi

uburyo bwo kuvura isepfu wakorera mu rugo,
no “gukunda umurimo”
ariko ndatekereza ku batabasha kuwishyura".

gukemura ibibazo bahura na byo buri munsi

nari mvugishijwe mumbabarire ntibyongera
nta polisi, nta bantu tutazi”.

Nabyutse kare kuruta uko bisanzwe kugirango mbone gari ya moshi ya mbere. (Eldad)
igihe icyo ari cyo cyose 
gukora ingendo cyangwa ubucuruzi aha na hariya
amafaranga ariyo abafasha kubaho 
yakomeje gukora indirimbo nyinshi 
naka agira umutima mwiza,

gukwiye gutuma inzego zibishinzwe zifata ingamba.

ubu ruri "mu kaga neza neza"

hino mu gihugu ehehembwe Isibo

igateza amakimbirane mu ngo

yanavuze ko umutobe ari wo ufitiye umubiri akamaro
Sinigeze numva nishimye cyane mubuzima bwanjye. 
uri umunyeshuri wigenga icyo gihe
Wikorera mu gihombo urya ibirenze ibyo winjije
Yavuze ko ubu hari gukorwa ibarura 
byaba ibibi cyangwa ibyiza.
bagashora ku mbuga nkoranyambaga 
kandi abakobwa b’ I Kigali twabaga turi kumwe
Igihe umuti umaze ukoreshwa cg umubare wʼabantu bawukoresheje
Biba byiza gukorana imibonano mpuzabitsena
Amwe muri ayo magambo 
Polyphenols kandi nazo zibamo
nubwo ntahise mwizera ako kanya
iligala ni hantu wicarana ninshuti zawe muganira
umukobwa nibwo ateruye ibyo yarafite
maze baramwemerera ararwiteza
ikindi umusaruro wabyo ndi kuwubona ubu
yavutse tariki ya cumi na kabiri werurwe 
Hanze mu kiraro gishyushye
Akagari ka Kabilizi, Umudugudu wa Mata,
Ruswa mu kazi, ikibazo ku rubyiruko
gifite akamaro mu mubiri w’umuntu
Papa we ashaka ko amuvira mu nzu,
Wari ufite urunigi rwiza imbwa kugirango itazaruma. 
ntiyamusaba ko bakorana cyeretse ariwe ubimusabye
Ikintu kijya kigora abahungu
ubugondo n’andi mabara yose y’inka yari azirimo.
Kubabara mu gituza, cyane 
rutukana, rusebanya, rusarikana n’ibindi.
Nari mfite ibintu byo gukora kuburyo ntabonye umwanya wo kumva mfite irungu. 
uruhago, uruhu, n’ibindi binyuranye.
mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri.
“Nkuko bisanzwe, tuzatsinda muri ibi bihe bikomeye
arishinga impirike rireba mu nzu; ararishimangira cyane
kwitiranya umutungo w’idini n’uw’ishyirahamwe,
kwanduzanya na byo bishobora kwiyongera.
Ubwo Rutare yasozaga amashuri yisumbuye
Byizerwa ko balale ifite ururimi rwabo. 
no kudaca inyuma uwo mwashyingiranywe
Na Amalon, nabandi benshi barashoboye
Ubwenge bwawe burihe muhungu?
Byagaragariye buri wese ko amajwi ari hafi. 
Indimu ifasha abantu bakunda kubabara mu ngingo
mu rwiganwa rudafite ubushishozi,
imiryango yanyu igomba guterana 
Mu by’ukuri ntakindi yabikoraho 
yaguye muri iyi mpanuka mu kwezi gushize
Ntugomba na rimwe kwibagirwa akamaro kabyo
Aha itegeko ryatanze uburenganzira mu buryo bukurikira
umunsigira umutima muke urumve mutima muke
uyu munsi hari ibirori byo kumwakira
niyo mpamvu kubyirinda bizagufasha kugabanya ibiro
Uwo mukobwa amaze kumenya
Nababwira gushaka umuntu ubibafashamo.
bagerageza gukemura ibibazo bijyanye n’iterambere
Leta y’u Rwanda iherutse gushyiraho amabwiriza
ku buryo byari bigoye kuharerera.
iyi nkuru nta gishya kirimo usibye gutuma nshyukwa
waretse ishyari ukampa inota ya  bitanu
Umuntu uri mu kato bamubwira ibyo agomba gukora,
Abakobwa batanu bakatiwe n’urukiko
Iyo nzu ishaje batekereza ko ihigwa. 
cyangwa abari mu kaga barengerwe”.
binyuze mu byo Mara Group imaze gushyira hano mu Rwanda
aho navukiye hano mu Rwanda 
ibintu bitandukanye cyane n'uko ubusanzwe bikorwa
ni ishingiro ry’umuryango rusange w’abantu
Iri mu ruhande rwacu muri iyi minsi igoye

wenda kubera imipaka yacu ikomeye
udahubagurika, kandi ibyo bikurinda gusubika ibikorwa

Ibyo bigeregezwe n’emeteke y’Igihugu
Twari tumaranye imyaka irindwi gusa 
amata n’ibiyakomokaho na poroteyine
ebenyerwende bumve ubumwe
Ibyiciro bishya by’ubudehe byitezweho kuzamura imibereho myiza...
Muri ako kanya, bisi irahagarara. 
byasinyanye amasezerano agamije kwagura ubufatanye
mama na we akunda kuririmba indirimbo za kera.
yasize dufite abana batatu,
Ubuntu ndetse amafaranga abayobozi 
woroye inkoko zisaga ibihumbi bitatu
i myenda ya Kinyarwanda ndayikunda
ndetse yiyemeza kuvuga inkuru ye 
ibyaba byiza ni divayi itukura

bitandatu birimo imikino itandukanye, 
ukayatanga kugira ngo bakwigishe

bizatuma yongera kumva ko afite impamvu yo kubaho

niba umubiri yagezemo igapfa

ariko umugabo yagize atya yinywera  agatama,

gutera imbere byawe bizakugora.

ahantu bugera kuri hegitari.

Amababi umunani ya sukumawiki
Mperuka, umwuka wanjye wagendagendaga ndi maso
ahubwo agakoresha gusa imoso gusa,.

mu by'ukuri bigufasha gutsinda.

akimara gufatisha ubuzima yamwiyomoyeho
aho za byeri ziteretse hanze

kuko ahanini umuco w’abantu ugaragarira mu ndangagaciro

ariko uyu mukino ngo waramuryoheye 
ufatwe n’ubwoba bukabije wihebe cyane 
ariko ko nta gihugu kizahabwa urukingo 
Byose bishobokera ubasha ku byizera

kuko arakora kuva mugitondo kugera nijoro,

mu gihe bigitegerejwe nukwihangana

nabyutse mugitodo cyakare nkireba hejuru ndikanga
'Ndikuzigama amafaranga yanjye ubu'

ariko nyuma aza kumenya ko ntacyo yahindura
Nibyo, ntabwo wakoze byinshi kugeza ubu. 
bituma ubwoba bwe bushira,
isombe ni ifunguro riva mu bibabi by’imyumbati,
emekuru yose ni meze cyene

ngo kangaroo ni ubwoko bwa mbere bumenyekanye
Nize amashuri abanza i Kagugu

ibice ndangagitsina by'imibiri yabo

nabyo bigira uruhare mu gutuma ahazaza haba heza

umuntu arota atyo iyo afite ibibazo

onja ebyiri nazo zirakenewe
ku Icyumweru cya cumi na rimwe

nyina yabaga yabonye ashakisha ibyo barya.
ngo Abanyarwanda babayeho neza
abaturuka mu mirenge icyenda

ubu irimo kubikurikiranira hafi 
ukwiye mu burezi n’uburere by’urugo nyerwende

andi mashyirahamamwe bihuje intego

n’uburyo bwo kwishimisha mu buzima busanzwe.”
ngo ujye wumva ko ukoze ikintu kidakwiye

yashimiye uruhare abaturage bagira 
ijya kuba nka grippe
yishingirkirije inyigisho n’imyemerere y’idini runaka
ariko buri munsi yarampamagaraga
aho kuri ubu atakibasha kwita kubana be batatu.

[mwene nyina] Nubwo mwene nyina asa nkumuto kurenza Mariya, mubyukuri arakuze cyane. 
Gusa mu cyumweru gishize yemeje ko abarwayi bakize
ni abo mu murenge wa Rambura mu karere ka Nyabihu
Nifuzaga ko uyu munsi bitashyuha cyane. 
bityo twaje kujya kwa nyogokuru 
banyifuriza ibyiza bose ntanumwe uvuyemo
kubuzwa ukwishyira ukizana mubaturage
nkajya nkorerwa isuku n'umuhungu,

atura agahinda ke microfone
Ndi gukora indirimbo yitwa Mbabarira
Nyamuneka ngwino ubafashirize hano 
Nk’uko byavuzwe haruguru,
mu gihe maganbiri Frw ariyo make 
mu gatuza cyangwa n’ahandi.
Ni bangahe kugeza isomero kuva hano? 
Irakoze guherekeza umwana wabo
bashatse gutoroka ikigo bashizwemwo
cyo umunsigaburira abana mu bigo
atuma ibihugu byombi bishobora kugirana ubutwererane,
umunsiko ari zo shingiro n’inkingi by’iterambere
mwene se arandusha imyaka ibiri, ndatekereza. 
Kuki waje ukererewe wowe n’umuhungu wawe?
dore ko rwari rwahiye kare
yagereranyije n’isoko rinini ku bucuruzi
bigatuma uwahohotewe atamenyekana ngo afashwe.

kuburyo ubashije kumwumva akuba nawe
yavanywe mu kigo ubundi agasubizwa iwabo,
ubwo abo wica ubica ute
mu Kegeli ke Gesebo.

wabwira umukunzi wawe mu bihe by’akababaro
nkibintu byinshi WinLose yatsinze.

hari ibyo yaburiye irengero

Kuzana impano kuri buri mwana

mugirane ubushuti bukomeye cyane
Uyu mutwe ufi te umwihariko wo gusesengura
nyuma y’iyo iminota mirongo ine nitanu

birangwa muri Islam ibyo byose

Kuki yagukunda, akagumbira mugihe urukundo rwawe rwose nk’ impumyi?
rimwe akaba yanagira uruhare mu kubasenyera,
turagenda akazi ndakabona tubah
niba umubiri wawe utarageramo iyo virus
bwazamutse ku kigero cya makumyabiri na rimwe kw’ijana
bingiraho ingaruka nyinshi cyane
yahindutse intambara y'imbere yamaze amasaha abiri
ari ibyo dukomora ku bandi cyangwa dusangiye n,abo.

kujya ahahurira abantu benshi

iki gitekerezo yaracyumvise maze abishyira mu bikorwa.

ku buryo ashobora gutunga umwana

amashuri yisumbuye na za kaminuza yongeye gusubukura 
ni menshi cyane ntayo naguha
bituma amaraso anyura mu mitsi yo ku bwonko
igihe cyo guteka ipirawu 
Isoni zarampombeje mba narahagumye
kandi rugaragaza ikizere iyi kopmpanyi ifite mu bucuruzi 
kandi na bo bakeneye kujyana n’ibigezweho
umunsi muco zirushaho kwihuta no umunsiramba
akanabimenyesha abaganga bakamukurikirana
ndetse na vitamin B gatatu

mu by'ukuri uba wibwira iki
haba mu masezerano, haba mu byo yemereye aband
n’ibindi byinshi binyuranye dukora bitewe na bwo.

ikaba ihinga ku buso bungana na hegitari
Na none bwira ari ntabaranesha abandi
akabaruwa ku mugore n'abana banjye
mu bwoko bumwe n'ubwavumbuwe bwa mbere
uyu mwana azi gukora bimwe mu bikoresho

gukoresha imoso bishobora guterwa no kwigana.

bimaze kurengera birasaba ko tubirwanya
bugamije guumunsimira  icyo cyorezo

umutwe witwaga  witwaga Ababito. 
Gusa mu bihugu byinshi, 
Ni bwo bigiriye inama yo kujya gucumbika
Ibyambayeho ni birebire gusa na nubu sinzi 
igitaramo cyabereye muri stade ya kaminuza yigenga 
nushaka unarenzeho amazi yo kunywa
abantu bakagenderana bikaba urujya n’uruza
neko yerihiye murumune wenjye ne mushiki wenjyemuto
n’uko turadabagira turanywa turishima.
muri icyo gihe nabaga ndushye 
impa Amagi atatu atogosheje

ngo ndebe uko bigenda,
Ni mwiza cyane!nuko atirata nkabandi
amakuru y’uko guhera mu mwaka  uutaha 
ufunze ibigenze newe ntecyo ubone
ngo yabuze n’ubumujyana kwituma.
mu nzego zose z’ubuzima,
kandi uterure ibyawe Mwana wanjye 
ibinyobwa bya Kombucha na Kargazok 
Nukora ibyo, uzangiza ibintu byose. 
abamuhonga ngo bamuhe ibyo umutima 
Twashyizeho iyo gahunda ngo tubegere cyane, 
nibigukungeheze bikwiye nuko
Kuzamuka kw'iyi mibare biteje umpungenge
mu ntangiriro y'ukwezi kwa karindwi
Ninde wavuga ibitagenda neza cyangwa byiza?
Nyabarongo yataemo undaheka zitagira ingano
avuga ko ibyuma akora bigizwe ahanini n’ibikoresho
Polisi ikorera mu Karere ka Rubavu yafashe itsinda ry’abantu
Ubuzima bwari bworoshye cyane mbere yibyabaye byose. 
ugusubiza imbaraga ahantu hakora cyane,
akabuhabwa n’abandi nawe akabuha abandi. 
ufite ibimenyetso wese akwiye kuguma mu rugo
Nkunda gusiganwa ku maguru ya Alpine kurenza ski ya Nordic. 
ndetse n’uwahoze ari perezida w’u Bufaransa 
ntigomba kurenza abantu mirongo itatu bayitabiriye
yavuze ko ubwitange busanzwe
kuvugana umutima, urampeka ku mutima,
kubera ubutayu buba muri ako gace
Kubagwa ni ubwoko bw'umuti.
Abashingamateka ba Venezuela bahungiye mu nyubakwa z’ubuserukizi
Ubu rwose ni ikintu cy'ingenzi 
yanze gusibangana mu mutima we 
buherekejwe n’amashusho  ye ubwe
Numvise ko Noheri akunda umuziki wa kera. 
ibyiciciro byose yabyize
ni uko nta mwanya uhari wo kwita ku mwana 
Ku rundi ruhande ariko hari ababyumva uko 
wa bisi yicarwamo mu bice bibiri 
Ndagaya neza byibuze mbere yuwo munsi nagize hanze

akagali ka Murambi mu murenge wa Gikomer
kumera amenyo ahinda umuriro 
ko mu Rwanda muri rusange hari abahanzi bake
iyi yawurute ugomba kuyongera ku mafunguro
Yesu iumunsiregire; ugire impegerike; 
Bibiliya itangira ivuga iby’iremwa
ati ndategerereza hano hanze
gufata ikintu mu kiganza kimwe agishyira mu kindi, 
Ebenyerwende behuriyeho kendi bibonemo.
uwandihiraga yanyigishaga gusenga

kuko nawe uri umubyeyi wa Alide 
akanamushinja kwiyitirira umwana we
ashakana na Enriques Almeida, 
ariko icy’ingenzi ni ingano y’ibyo usoma
umunsiko Intore yose yamaraga
urasanga utagakwiye gusiba kugifata.

Ni iki kigutera kwemeza ko nshaka kuba inshuti yawe ibaze nawe
Kerri yifuzaga ko akundwa nabenshi
Wahora niki wa musore we 
iyo bihagaritswe zisubira kuri gahunda
bakazisumbisha ururimi urwabo nukuri
aba ingumba kubera iki kibazo,
gushyira ku mutima ayo masomo y’ingenzi
ngo batavaho basangira ubwo bugari,

w’ebekurikirene ibi bikorwe by’imyidegeduro
Kuri Paruwasi ya Ruhango harimo kubakwa
Kwakira abakugana neza bisaba ubumenyi no kubyitwararika.
ariko igitangazamakuru People's Daily
ku bagore ntibiba byoroshye 
singombwa ko mukora kimwe mwese
kandi bigufasha no mu kubyara birihuta.”
burya koko ntawe uvuma urukundo.
hanyuma aramwenyura, yemeza
mu Kegeli ke Gesebo
yabyutse akerekeza aho abyutse areba 
Ibi hari ubwo bishora Abanyarwanda 
“umwambaro w’umutima ugaragarira mu myifatire 
cyangwa se abakuze gusa
yaragakoze akazi ko kuragira ingurube.
ku ntoki no mu josi maze aramubwira 
ashobora kunyobwa n’abantu bose
ko ntacyo yangiza ku bidukikije cyangwa ibindi binyabuzima.
Wigeze wishimira hano i Kayonza? 
Iyo arisobanura yisanisha na ‘Yesu
Nta byemezo bya siyansi biremeza ko uwo muti uvura
Rwende rwifetenyije n’isi kwizihizenye
kugira ngo barinde inzigo.
abagiramenyo  nababwira iki muyerekane 
Iyi hazabu iriyongera ku nzu z’ubucuruzi 
umutekano wo kuri Kaminuza ya King's College
Ingendo zi banga
Ati Ndashaka kuba ndi ku rwego nk’urw’ingagi. 
kuko iba wari mu Bufaransa 
gusa nta kundi byagenda nukubyakira 
uyu muhungu  wawe wariye ibyawe byose
yagombaga kumuba hafi akamubwira
Ibyo tuzabigarukaho mu nkuru zacu zitaha.
Hasi ya chimney irashobora kunyerera
abwira ibivugiramo ati mbahaye igice 
Igitunguru kirinda gucikagurika k’umusatsi.
Kuko urwo rwagwa n’ubundi ruva mu mutobe
kurariza magi y’inkoko za kizungu
mu gihe abandi bazitungaga ari icumi
kandi tuzi ko ibitera ibibazo byo mu mutwe
ko gikwiye gushimwa kandi giha ubuzima bwe 
ikibazo cyo kubura igishoro
maze bakabona kumenya  ko bashobora kuba batinze.
baramusasiye araryamye.Mu gitondo abwira se
icyewuhungebenye hibendwe cyene
Ufite mu ishuli rimwe umwana utazi gusoma no kwandika
byunvikana nkuko bikwiye  kandi biragoye
Ninde mufilozofe ukomeye wabayeho? 
Umutobe wo mu gisheke
nyina yari yaremye wenyine.
Abo bana bavutse nyuma y’ibintu byinshi bikomeye,
ndetse n’abafite malariya y’igikatu bakoherezwa kwa muganga hakiri kare. 
Urukwavu rwatinze gushya
Bwa mbere hageragejwe urukingo rwa coronavirus
kuko yagombaga kugenda ahandi
Iyo niyo sisiteme y’ iyi isi dutuyemo
uburyo bwo kwirinda kiriya cyorezo bwatangajwe 
mu gihe yarwaye babuze uburenganzira bwo kwivuriza 
ariko ibisigaye uba ukwiye gushaka impuguke
imikino ikoresha imashini z’imikino y’amahirwe
guhemba umubyeyi, gusohora no kwita umugaboizina

Ubu hari imiti ndetse n’inyunganiramirire bikoze mu bimera

kubera ubwo burwayi ariko aza gusezererwa
Nagiye kare kugirango mbone intebe nziza. 
nibyo ugaragaza niba wubaha cyangwa utubaha
uririmba mu itorero Inganzo Ngari
cumi nabatandatu  bamaze guhitanwa na yo,
kuko igikorwa kimara umwanya munini
gukurikiza amabwiriza y’isuku

basezranye uyu munsi imbere y’amategeko
bikemezwa na muganga wemewe na Leta ;
amazi yegera inkombe cyangwa akayitarura,
ndetse ko yamutsindiye mubandi
Kuki utekereza ko nicaye hano? 
Dore uko Ebenyerwende bumve ubupfure:
ndetse n’abafite ubukene bukabije
Muri iyi nkuru tugiye kurebera hamwe
Nk’uko umwe muri ba gitifu w’akagari yabivuze
sosiyete yacu irashaka kugira uruhare muri uwo mushinga w'ubushakashatsi. 
Nyarwaya ashyira agatima mu nda,
Ku kigo nderabuzima barimo gupima umuvuduko wamaraso
Kujya mu mihango biba kuri buri mukobwa, 
Humura bigiye kurangira ntakibazo gihari
Hagiye kuvuka amashuli ya prive
ntibavunwe no kujya kwishakashakira iby’ibanze,
mwene ngango ntabwo yari yiteze ko inama izamara igihe kinini. 
Birababaje kuba ntumva icyongereza neza. 
Gerageza gutangira gucuruza, tangira ukorere ifaranga , 
Ubu maze kumenyera neza
Kuganira ku ikosa ryakozwe
twekomeje umunsibeho muri ubwo buzime bubi
ingamba zafashwe iyo zifatwa mbere 
ntebwo ubwitenge eri mvemehenge umunsiko mu Burunndi

Umukozi yahise akora nk’uko abwiwe

yagiye ahura n’abamucaga intege
noneho se aza kujyana na shebuja 
Yabaye umukinnyi wahize abandi

kuko iyo ubishyizemo mbere bibyara amazi
bari bafite impungenge ku mutekano ku binyabuzima
bisaba kuba afitanye ubusabane na Kirisitu,
mwene muyombano afite ubwenge burenze uko wabitekereza. 
ndetse n’ibigega n’ibibumbiro by’abahinzi n’aborozi

abo abajije bamubwira ko ari iza Nkana.
bo ntibigeze bashyira mu ibuku ubu bwoko

ubwoko bwayo bukambukira ahumutse

n’aho uyu mugabo yaterefonnye ni kimwe

hari kandi n’ibikorwa by’imyidagaduro

ndetse agace k’ibuye kakamwinjira mu bwonko

ubwo twemererwaga gutwara abagenzi

kugeza igihe uzagerera kuri rya juru.

na Siporo muri uyu muhango,
ukamara iminsi mike utayambara

mu buryo yahatse Kiranga akamukiza; 
urugendo rwo kubigeraho ntirwamworoheye.

avuga ko abanyarwanda bakwiye gukangurirwa

bwabayeho biturutse ku bwihindurize

ari uko umwe muribo yiyanze
zikarisha Urukaryi rwose, 
Ndashaka ko uwo mwana ataza
abantu bahumeka bitewe n’abasanzwe bakirwaye bakorora,bitsamura
ahubwo akenshi biterwa n’uko wihaye intego
naraturikaga nkarira ndijyenyine
katarengeje interuro eshatu ku ngingo y’imibanire myiza
ibigenze newe ntecyo ubone
kutabona no kutavuga nibo bavuga
ubundi rwinjiza agera kuri miliyoni makumyabiri z'amadolari
ariko narakomeretse bikomeye
mu gihe ushobora kuba wafashe aho iri birayica.
Dufite intwaro nziza kuruta umwanzi. 
mu muco n’indangamanota z’Abanyarwanda,
ruwize mbabarira nkusabe ikintu kimwe gusa,
kandi bakabakurikirana umunsi kuwundi
Amaze kubimenya yigumira iwe, 
kuko abakozi ntibashoboraga kwigaragambya
byabaga byararengeje igihe cyo gucuruzwa,
akazana uruhu rwiza ndetse n’intoki 
ndetse na Blarirwa ntiyahomba
nyuma y’igihe gito gikwirakwira mu isi

bamwe muri abo bashoferi

ibihumbi bitandatu ni bo bamaze kwandura 
baje gutahura ko umuti ndimo kubaha utujuje ubuziranege
kumenyekanisha umusaruro mu mushinga wanjye
Orange yegera umuhondo isa ite
asaba Abanyarwanda gukaza ingamba mu kukirinda.
aravuga ko imyumvire iri ku isonga
umunsizirika umugozi mu mutwe uhetse ikivomesho
ko hari abandi bantu benshi banduye
gusa rimwe narimwe abayobozi harabigumira mubiro
Abantu rimwe na rimwe bashukwa kurya ibirenze ibyo bagomba kurya. 
kandi muburyo bwinshi butandukanye
ko umuneke utari icyo ucyeka ko uricyo
ari ryo jwi twumva iyo dusepfuye.

uretse kumva ibyiyumviro rimwe na rimwe bitari byo

Isoko ry'ibiva mu mazi rya Wuhan
Kuko intare yo muri south africa 
Ibyo urubyiruko ruhura nabyo
kandi hari abagizi ba nabi babibasiye 
na bo tubashishikariza kwifashisha ibindi bikoresho byabugenewe 
inyamaswa byorohereye nko mu kanwa, mu mazuru no mu maso.
gukorwaho iperereza yahise ajya umunsi mbuga
ubwitange nta kintu na kimwe cyaduherana
Uyu munsi dufite gushyira hamwe
hakaba hakomeje kwirindwa ko havuka ingorane
Bukeye atera mu Burundi bw’umusoni 
“Birumvikene ko heri uburengenzire bwegiye bugebenuke
uyu mukinnyi nta Coronavirus afite, 
Ira afite imyaka makumyabiri nibiri
nyuma yaho batangiye kuruburira isoko 
Akarere kamwe ko mu Burusiya
tubiri muri two ni ibice byatwo 
ko wari utwaye imodoka bigenze bite?”
amavuta agereranyije n’inyanya 
Mu gihe twari tugiye kwisanzura 
Ibyo urimo gukora ubu ni bibi cyane kuruta ibyo mwene se yakoze. 
mu mikorere myiza y’imyakura 
hari ingaruka nziza byaba bigira, 
Reka twinjire kugirango abatari hano batubure 
batangiye kutwambara kandi ari benshi
Aha ni ahazwi nka ’Buswayilini’.
Hari ubwoba ko idatinda
bitewe n’umuntu, imimerere arimo n’ubwoko bw’indwara arwaye
ukawukorana umwete, ukaba ugomba umunsibahiriza igihe
Ryari se ngo nze
ariko inama bajemo ntibayijyamo 
ko bwabonye urukingo rwa Coronavirus 
aho nkora nta wundi muntu wari waje gukora
abakozi bakora mu bigo bikina imikino y’amahirwe

Natasha Tiwari umuhanga mu by'imitekerereze
usanga abantu ari urujya n’uruza bifuza kwifata neza, 
agenda ibiromotero hafi icumi

bakayishyura kandi bafite n’amakipe bakunda.

kujya guca inshuro muri Uganda 
uriya mwana umwe aranzi sinagenda andeba,
Navuze buhoro kugirango bashobore kunyumva. 
ukonjesha ibice bituma gucishwa mu cyuma bishoboka.

cyane umunsi umwe murumuna wanjye
umunsi tariki ya munani.
ibyo warangije gukora cyangwa umaze kugeraho, 
agira iti ‘Imana ni urukundo’ 
Nabifashe nk'ukuri ko yakiriye ibaruwa yanjye. 
Najye ndahaguruka ariko mpaguruka mfite agahinda

tariki enye Gicurasi bibiri na makumyabiri
mu ndirimbo yatagiriyeho mu Rwanda
nk’uwo nashyingiye ejobundi,
gutegura imyenda y’umugabo n’ibindi
ubuhinde bwazamutse ku kigero cyu umunani kwijana

ikunze gufata abakuze cyane

Ibimenyetso byayo ni inkorora, umuriro,
Niba udafite akamashini kabugenewe
amubwira ibyamubayeho akiri umwana.

gukora imirimo yose uko iri.

mwene se akunda aha hantu kuruta aho yari atuye.

ehubwo behebwe ubwigenge

icyo umutima ushaka amata aguranwa itabi,

mu kugira ibyo bumvikanaho.
umugozi w'urukundo nubwoya. Umuntu gufata no gukunda,

akajyana inzoga ihenze cyane

gukwirakwiza ingeso z’ubusambanyi

Abazigaba ni ubwoko buba mu Rwanda
“ntimugahangayikishwe n’iby’umunsi w’ejo
yamaze gusinya amasezerano y’ubufatanye n’u Rwanda
nineho nkakubwira ijambo,maze ugakora icyo ushaka 
butuma byoroha kuyageza mu maso,
bamwe biyitirira imyemerere y’idini runaka
gusa yadukoreye ubwoko bubiri 
umugebo we ko yebyeye eriko ebyere igisimbe
Uwo mugore ekibone ibimubeyeho
Ubundi hasendwa umugore utazikwiyitaho
natangiye ubwangavu nkiri muto cyane
ukorera urugo rwawe neza
mu kurwanya abarenga ku mabwiriza
ntibibinjirize n'igiceri cy'ijana pe
Insongi izehetse ivamo iki 
nta genzura ry'umwuka wo muri ibyo bintu byose
bivuze ko nta buryo bwa placebo
turakomeza kuyikorera ubushakashatsi
Nasohotse hano kwishimira amahoro n'ituze 
kuko warimo amazi menshi. cyane
ubucuruzi bw’indirimbo zanditse 
Uruganda rw’umutobe rutangiye 
ukayireka ikumuka, uga shyiraho indimu na perisiri
ubwo yibandaga cyane mu njyana ya R&B, 
kendi bingeri nyinshi
ubumenyamuntu, imibanire n’abandi,
ni nayo mpamvu yaje acumbagira afite n’inkoni”

umunsimva umuyobozi avuga  ko
minisiteri y'ubuzima mu Rwanda

hakoreshejwe amajwi yabo bose,
kandi ritwara umwanya muto
kandi bagiye gukora ibishoboka byose basabwa 
mu gutuma bamwe mu banyarwanda batitabira imikino

ndamwenyura, kandi nkurikira nawes

ntabwo ubwitange ari mvamahanga

Muri aka karere, mu zindi ndwara n'ibyugarije ubuzima bw'abantu
nyamara ngo no mu mitekereze naho nuko
banza byibura unamwereke ko wamubera inshuti

yewe n’incuti zanjye magara.
Icyo gihe benshi bararize 
Aho ibishyimbo bibonekeye neza
kandi zigasekurika neza cyane
Ugomba kuguma ureba neza  hano ntihasanzwe 
utamenerwamo muri iki gihe kitoroshye;
Ubunebwe n’ubutandame bituma yicisha inzara abana,
usanga bafite tatuwaje ku mibiri yabo
abana mu nzu imwe n’umugore wabandi
maze bikaba ngombwa ko yumva
Naba uburiganya kuvuga Noheri -
umwereka bucye ko hari n’ubundi buryo
yagize ati “Kubera ko igituntu ari indwara yandura,
imyaka makumyabiri nitanu yari amaze ari Papa
mu bitaramo bitandukanye yabaga yagiye gucurangamo
amasomo muri Kora Coaching bayishimiye ubumenyi bungutse
nabyo byatangaje abantu ba mbere bishwe
Mu ndengegeciro zishemikiye umunsi umunsibehe ubuzime 
tugakora ibishoboka byose tugakurikiza inama 
abaganga bakabyamaganira umunsire 
umwe aba kure y’undi.
akenera mu buzima bwa buri munsi, 
avuga ko iki cyorezo kimaze guhitana benshi
yamuhaye urupapuro bita certificat d’honneur.
Izi nizo mpamvu z’ingenzi 
Jye nari nzi ko izo ntoki zose ziba zicigatiye urwagwa
ariko burya ngo hari ibimenyetso 
Aha ni mu kwezi kwa cumi na kumwe
Ariko ntibagarukiraga aho gusa
ingano ihagije yo kurinda abo mu nzego z'ubuzima.
ko ufite ibintu byinshi bigutandukanya n’Imana.
mu bikorwa by’ubwitange bugamije guumunsimira icyorezo 
iyo ni imvugo ikoreshwa nabakomeye
Ugatuma nsangwa nkanisanga 
ngamije ntashobora gutwara imodoka kuburyo ahora atwara igare. 
ntuwambare uyu munsi n'ejo
akihutira kujya kwa muganga bakamurebera ikibitera

Hari undi wavuze ko ibyo uwo mukobwa

Muri Ntibavuga Bavuga y’ubushize
amushima kubuhanga afite bwinshi
n’akamaro k’ibyo yagukoreye
kuramba no kurama; ubuzima burangwa
birimo no kuba yaregukanye igikombe

mwene se akunda ubuhanzi kuruta ibindi byose kwisi. 
ariko Ubushinwa buzayitsinda

no gukomeza  n’amatako

ibibuzwa gukora muri siporo igihe utwite
Nzakomeza musure  kugeza igihe nzaba mukeneye
Ntabwo menyereye gukorana muri ubwo buryo
ayo tukayinjiza ku mwaka muri Kenya
Ijambo ry'Imana mubitekerezo ... nibyifuzo byanjye, 
Itsinda ry'abashakashatsi bo kuri Kaminuza ya Sheffield
icyuma aba afasheho kivaho
Ninini cyane kuruta uko nabitekerezaga. 
Ibiro by'iposita ni urugendo rw'iminota mike uvuye hano 
bwabayeho binyuze ku bwihindurize
bigaterwa n’uburyo yarurwanye.
Biratangaje kubona ntacyo abiziho. 
ntibatanga urukundo ku nshuro ya mbere
mureke rero tumubaze kugirango tubyuzuze
cyangwa se umuntu bitewe n’ibintu bitandukanye.

Kirezire gutetire Igihugu Igihugu ni ingobyi i
Ntabwo nagusaba gukora ikintu cyose udashobora gukora.

bituma umuntu adakunda neza,

Nari naje nambaye imyenda ya sporo

impungenge  ku mikino y’amahirwe 
inkoko zo mu Rwanda
kuko ndi umuntu udasanzwe ...
utizagama ari ukwiyambura ibyo wari ufite,
ukamurwa muri soya wose

Hari ikintu cyihariye ushaka kurya? 
umutobe w’uruvange rw’imboga n’imbuto
Umuryango wose wazindukiye mu cyumba cye
icyorezo cya coronavirus  gisa n’icyagabanyije umurego
ndabizi niwumva ibyambayeho ntuzigera umbabarira
Ibi nibyo byose bizwi kugeza ubu. 
uba wumva iyo urwaye
Iki ni ikintu cy’ingenzi cyane
Kuri bamwe bishobora kumara n’amezi 
mubigo byinshi  byo mu Rwanda
Byatanzwe na Murundi wawundi uzi
ntabwo yashakaga gufata uburakari
Abaturage baturutse ikasikazi ndabashaka
nuko nange nkomereza aho.

Ntakibazo ndumva byumvikana mwihorere
barenga icumi ngo bagere kuri iryo sesengura

aumunsibiye muri iki gitabo umunsigira ngo abasomyi
ntiyari yemerewe gukora ibimwinjiriza amafaranga
nishe Ntagihera mucuza imfura iyanjye irandamira
Abantu bahura n’ibibazo bitandukanye. 
amasoko yo kugemura imyaka mu bigo by’amashuri 
yishwe abasambane ntiyishwe n’Abega
bitiriwe iyo myemerere bavugwaho
Reka rero umunsi umwe tuzabikore
gusiga irangi, kubumba no kubaza amashusho
mu muryango w’abana icumi,
ibi bikabatera kunezezwa n’uyu murimo.
mu gihe cyo kubyara hakiri kare
baba badashaka kwanduzwa n'ibyo bari gukoraho 
umurwayi akenera hagati y'uducupa dutanu  na dutandatu

Abajura babaye benshi cyane
kugira ngo na rwo rubone kwirinda.

Uko aryagagura inzoka zikarushaho kwitotomba,
njyewe n murumuna wanjye ariko
birekereho kugeza ubwo uburibwe bushize.
Kubyuka kare cyane mugitondo
umuhungu na nyine ngo baje mu Rwanda
nibwo njye na murumuna wanjye twigiriye inama

naba banyamahanga bakoresheje ikorana buhanga,
ibindi mubireke dufitanye urubanza numuhungu wamariya
yashimiye abaturage cyane byimazeyo 
igikorwa  giteganyijwe kuri uyu munsi.

ndebye nabi nazagera aho ngahinamirana
wabwira umukunzi agahora yifuza kugumana nawe

mwene se akora cyane kurenza uko yakoraga umwaka ushize. 
imyambaro ye ayifasha hasi,agaruka ateze amaboko.

wiumunsireho ukebitenge kendi newe

ubwo  abaturage barishima cyane
Ntakunze kubura ibintu nkibi
Kubika umuriro igihe kirekire
agomba kuba atari munsi y’imyaka cumi numunani
mbere yo gutahura mpamvu nyayo itera zimwe gupfa 
yakozwe n’Itorero ry’Igihugu;
umubabaro no kuririmba ibikora ku mitima ya benshi.
Ico cegeranyo kivuga ko gushika ubu
Ku wa makumyabiri nagatatu Nzeri 
amaforomo, impu, kole n’ibindi 
Ni ngombwa ko abaturage bose bagira uruhare mu bikorwa by’Igihugu
nubwo bikiri urugamba rukomeye
Umwana uri mu kigero cy’imyaka itanu
ku bukorerwa muri Pariki y’Akagera,
Iyi swater igura amadorari arenga mirongo itanu. 
abazitabira imurikagurisha rya makumyabiri na gatatu
Nkuko abibona ntanakimwe kiriyongera
beri behuriyeho kendi begombege umunsibehirize
kandi ibe yarabatijwe nayo
gutera urubwa, umunsibeshyerana,
uwo mugore yanubatse n’ikiraro
buryo butandukanye bubuza umuntu gutwara inda 
bityo zikaba zakora akazi kazo
umunsiba intangarugero: 
Ubu se aya magambo ndayakurahe

Umukozi ajya koga bwa kabiri

Naho ubundi hari igihe kiba kigeze

Uyu mutwe ufi te umwiheriko wo gusesengure

n’umufite wese arataha mu rugo ntamuhindukiza
ndetse yifuza ko bagirana umubano udasanzwe

hari Inyamaswa yitwa kangaroo 
Nibyiza gufata umwanya wawe kuriyi mirimo kuruta kwihuta no gukora amakosa. 
Ushyiramo umunyu n’agakombe k’amazi,
gukora siporo nk’uko bigaragara ku rubuga rwa Internet 
concombre,lettuce, zucchini na avoka
Mbega ibintu byiza cyane we
twagumye hano mumasaha make ari imbere 
imodoka twari turimo yari irimo njyewe 
no kurya indyo nziza itangiza ubuzima
Gutabarana birimo no kwita ku batishoboye n’abanyantege
ahasanga inka nziza cyane bituma abaririza nyirazo
umwihariko wo kumera nk’abahungu 
amafaranga yabo barayanze ngo ni make
Isi iramaze gutera intambwe itari nto mu kurwanya iyo ndwara.
Ibintu bitanu ukwiye kumenya
ko kuva kuwa mbere bitemewe
bamusaba kubafasha mubyo badashoboye
Abanyarwanda bemera ko umunsiba imfura umuntu abyitoza
ugira umujinya mwinshi kujya kwa muganga kwisuzumisha
basure urubuga rwa Gorilla Games bakine, bazarya pe
cyangwa bagurisha inyama gusa
ushobora kuyishyiramo wayitunganyije ikiri mbisi
kandi ni jyewe witwa gutyo,
Ubu buryo bwizewe cyane
Kubarenga hejuru mutangire undi murongo
Nininahazwe avuga ko yabonye ko uyu mwana afite impano yo gusetsa 
Maze abakunzi bazizihirwe 
Kwanga koga si byiza pe
miliyoni cumi nebyiri muri Uganda 
bikaba bishoboka ko yayiciye
Cyangwa niba hari ibyo mukora bizagurishwa ku isoko, 
Ndi muri komite y’umusigiti 
kugira ngo urukundo rwanyu rurambe,
Iyo urose undi muntu apfa 
kuburere bukwiye guhabwa abana 
ayakuye mu kwimenyereza umwuga ‘internship
Ibikorwa byabaye bihagaze
nari nabibemereye mu iketi yanjye yambere
Bagire isuku aho bakora n’aho barara 
ni iby’ingenzi cyane ku mubyeyi
Mu gihe bisa n'aho bidashoboka
ikintu ushaka kubona cyatunganye 
Ni uko bukeye aragenda 
mu gihe kitavuzwe byariho 
nyuma yo kongera gusohora indirimbo 
umugende, ingendo, ubudehe
Nta gushidikanya ko abantu bakunda amahoro kurugamba. 
ngo nabyo bijye kuri urwo rutonde
yinjiriza igihugu n’abayikinnye bakunguka

Urashobora kubyemera ibaze naweNdetse ni umunebwe kundusha. 
wese ashobora kwigisha isomo 
muri rusange n’iby’urubyiruko by’umwihariko
bakambara neza mu mutwe iyo bagiye kuri moto,
ubwamamare no guhangana kwabo bitabagira abanzi 
asanga aya mafaranga nta kindi yabasha gufasha mwalimu 
mwene se asa nkuwababara kurusha abandi.

agakoko nk’ivubi n’utundi twakuya
Ibimenyetso by’umusonga nibihe
kugira ngo bamutege amatwi. 
bana bagira uruhare mu kwyiimakaza 
urugwiro, ubwuzu, ishyaka, ishema, kwicisha bugu fi
mu muco w’u Burunndi, umunsigira uburere 
n’ibyo acungiye rubanda.
ibibi n’ibyize, ibyishimo n’emeumunsibe.
kuko urumva byombi uba ugomba kubikora
kuri uyu wa kabiri, 
twababwiraga ko twabifashijwemo n’amasengesho 
ukarura mu gisorori cyabugenewe ugategura ameza
umunsiko Intore yose yamaraga gutozwa 
Bo ngo bakaba batabyemera
ebeumunsiru muri rusenge, kwiyubehe bo ubwebo, 
nuko ndamuhagurutsa tujyana gukaraba twembi
rifasha abantu kurushaho kwitegura 
Kuki cyangwa se gute
mavuta mu bibabi by’inturusu
kuko aba akungahaye kuri vitamin D,
uwo umunsikwenge uri umunsire nk’ukwezi, n’ibindi.

Imvugo nziza si ivugiweho

harimo izikosorwa n’izidakosorwa

ni ukuntu yajyaga kureba aho biciye abantu

Umwuka ntabwo wari ukiri mwiza mu muryango
Amugeze iruhande akoma mu mashyi, 
Natangiye kumva ko nkunda umuziki 
yavutse ku itariki ya cyenda Mutarama
Muri iki gihe naho haje isura nshya
edesobenukiwe neze umuco umurenge
Iyi piscine ifite ubujyakuzimu burebure
ntibagahishire abantu babangirije abana,
amahirwe ntazongera kubona mubuzima
iboneka mu nyanya ishobora kongerera ireme intanga-ngabo
yari afite ingeso yuko yabanzaga kurya mbere yo gukaraba
hanyuma we akarenga akamucyurira urugo.

Uheruka i Nyabihu aho wakuriye ryari
Kwamamaza umunezero si ibyanyu gusa
bitewe no kwamamariza ibigo bitandukanye by’ubucuruzi 
ariko ngo ikayikorana imbaraga nyinshi 
eho ebekuru bige mu meshuri ebenze 
ndetse n’umuryango mugari nyarwanda 
iterwa n'ubu bwoko bushya bwa coronavirus
ahari mu gihe kinganga iki
kuba wakoresheje ubwonko bwawe cyane

uyu mutwe ufi te umwihariko wo gusesengura indangamanota

amubwira ko hari icyo agiye kumwereka.

nta n’icyo bapfana na kimwe

bikaba byaba ngombwa kugana kwa muganga.

baramya Imana zo mu duce dutandukanye batuyemo
Nibyo rero mu Rwanda yaba uranium irahari, 
Bazishimira cyane kubona mwene nyirakuru agaruka. 
None se w’abana we ni nde
ingufu zitunganywa mu gihugu hose
kuko yanabasuye akanabazirikana
ibi bishobora gutuma bibaho
kerekeranye no kuba yarashatse gukuramo inda, 
Akagenda agashora umuheha mu kijerekani
bati  Umuganga wari ku izamu ninde
n'ubwikorezi bwabyo buzaba bukenewe
nayigereranya n’umwambaro wiyo virus B
Uyu mubyeyi buri Cyumweru arateka
yaba abo abona hafi ye ndetse no kuri “internet”.
ubundi ndahumiriza nti nugire ikibazo
buri umuryango uba wifuza kubyara ugaheka
yakajije ingamba zo kurwanya malariya
bifashishije ibyatsi byo mu gishanga byitwa Inkorogoto.
Amase avura ubushye
itegeko ryo gukumire icuruzwe ry’ebentu,
abo bangana na rimwe nibice bibiri kwijana 
ava ku rwego rumwe ajya ku rundi.
Ubarusha byose ufite umukunzi! 
Ni ukudahemuka no kudahemukirwa
ukwiye kumenya ibyo bintu
cyangwa umuntu waba ugiye kubatwa niyo mico 
Mu kiganiro ngarukamwaka agira
nuko ubwobabugenda bushira gake gake.
Haga umuhango wo kuganuza umwami ku muto zeze mu Gihugu
Kandi itsinda rye ryari rikomeye
garura mo wa muceri wamaze gukonja
ako ka jambo ka nta mugabo nikabi
no kurinda indwara z’amaso ziterwa n’ubusaza
Nibura muburambe bwanjye ndabizi neza
abakozi bakorera mu Karere ka Rwamagana 
Hari aho imikino y’amahirwe yaciwe
bakurikirwa n’abarangije amashuri yisumbuye 
Selenium irinda uturemangingo fatizo kwangirika,
kamere muntu kandi gitanga igisubizo cy’uumunsiri
kurira, kurakara ndira mubitekerezo byanjye
Twakinnye hop scotch kumutwe wibiti bishaje
si ngombwa ko umuntu agomba kuba afite telefoni zigezweho
uko abaturage basatiraga iyi Parike
Umugore wafatiwe mu cyuho 
Bagurisha isukari n'umunyu muri iryo duka. 
amafaranga usabwa gukorera kugirango mubane neza
Iyi ndwara yo kwibagirwa iravurwa igakira
impano batanga zo kurwanya coronavirus 
Yihuta aho n'amaguru ye
kuko bamwe bibagiraho ingaruka bakabireka, 
ariko burashoboka nk’ibihugu by’inshuti.”
uretse ubusambo no gushaka guhirika ubutegetsi buriho 
ku mubiri w’umuntu hariho byinshi

nacunze yongeye guhabwa ikibari, 
nkwifurije kuzasaza usize inkuru nziza 
kugira icyo bakora itarafata indi ntera.
guverinoma kuba yarananiwe kurinda abaturage bayo,
amakamyo ageze ku mupaka aturutse muri Tanzania.
umugabo nazamukira ndamutse ntabikoze ubwo
ku buryo “nta mwijima, nta buzima”. 
harimo na kanseri y’ibere 
kwemera gukurikiza amabwiriza mashya 
ungana na Biliyari imwe ,ni million maganabiri

Igihe mukoze inama n’ababyeyi
Nibyiza kubona ko imbaraga zacu zitabaye impfabusa.

mureke rero twese dufatanye buri wese
hari amakuru wari ufite kuri corona

Betas ikora cyane kuburyo mutazi
Uko kwihagarika kenshi bifasha mu gusohora udukoko
cyangwa bakanywa icyitwa mercure.

Nibyo kuko nanjye nari mpari

Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe kuri iyi virus

iki kikaba ari igipimo cyo hasi
Uko ebenyerwende bumve ubumwe

umukozi aba araje kumubaza

twari dukumburanye cyane
ukamubwira uko bimeze wumva umeze.

bavuga ko amagerageza y'ibanze yatangiye

igihe waba ufatiwe mu makosa. 
afite abantu ashobora kwizera yakwegera akababwira ibibazo bye”.
Mbere hose ntabwo nabikubwiye se 
indwara bakunda kwita sinusite
yahishuye uburyo yasomanye bwa mbere
ubwo gukoresha impano yawe.
gukoresha imashini ku ishansiye,
bamaze kwemezwa ko bayirwaye 
Ariko ameze neza muribyo bimwe
Ba umurinzi wa mugenzi wawe.
Naho yagiraga Ubuntu butiza urugi
ubushotoranyi buvanze n’ishyaka ryo kwanga kurushwa ubugabo.
Hamwe na diyama irabagirana
Niyo mpamvu nkeneye imbaraga
Sinzi niba zari inzozi, 
maze simbyumve neza rwose
mwene nyirakuru ntabwo yakoze cyane nko gusezera. 
nacyo cyari kigizwe n’abanyeshuri mirongo itatu
Nta na rumwe muri izo rwashyizwe ku rutonde 
nayo yatangaje inkuru ivuga ibyiyi virus
Kurwara umwingo nabyo byakubaho
hakajyamo n’imyunyungugu binyuranye
Zimwe muri izo nyendiko z’ibenze zifeshishijwe ni izi
Bati Urabona ngo badusuzugure
Birumvikana ko umwarimu yigisha abanyeshuri
yakora ikosa uti ibi nibyo uhora ukora,
Beshe ko muretubeshe,twe 
imbuto zo muri buri cyiciro, 
ubudahangarwa bw’umubiri ikanafasha amaso kureba neza
Ibyo nibyo intumwa zose zikora
ubundi akamwumva,akamenya ibyamubayeho
nko kureka kwisiga ibintu byinshi mu maso
Ni ibintu bikomeye kubyumva”.
kiruta icyo mu Bwongereza,
yarambuye ukuboko maze arambwira
Ninjiye mu cyumba aho bagombaga kuyikuriramo
Yanakanguriye abashoramari kwitabira 
Niwe muntu wa mbere wazamutse umusozi wa Everest. 
Tumeze neza hano cyane rwose 
bikabagurira ibi bikoresho bakeneye
Kuko nk’uko bigaragazwa n’abahanaga
yabwiye Kigali Today ko iyo Minisiteri,
mu bindi bikorwa bibaganisha ku iterambere 
Mu mwuka wambere nibwo namusomye
ndetse n’uko mwaganiriye mu kiciro cyavuzwe
Amafaranga ibintu byose kurubu namafaranga
Indengemenote z’umuco w’u Burunndi Imico
kugirango udashirira cyangwa ugafata mu mpande ku ipanu
Ubwo ubivuze nyine ko ubitekereje,
Imiryango mpuzamahanga n’ibihugu bikomeye 
Mu minsi irindwi ishize
Abashakanye bibarutse nyuma y'amezi icyenda 
Umurenge wa Gisozi,
Leta y’u Rwanda n’iya Finland 
Nzi neza ko Celestin azasaba Mariya gusezerana. 
hari ni Abasenyewe n’ibiza,
Indengemenote zijyene n’ibihe
Igiciro cyicyo gitabo ni amadorari atanu. 
wo ku meza atari uwo mu gikoni
Mu karere ka Ngoma hari abatabyumva
Akagoroba k’ababyeyi, n’ibindi byose bigenda bikorwa.
cyangwa se imirire mibi
ariko nibura biratanga icyizere
Mfite ibintu byinshi ntakeneye. (marcelostockle)
Umwanditsi yanditse ku bantu
dusangamo indangamanota y’ubumanzi,
Ubu buryo nubwo abagabo benshi bibagora kubukoresha 
Twakwibukiranya ko hariho amagambo atagikoreshwa
Luis twavuze tugitangira,
Ibiryo bimaza kuza ari bicye
Gikukuru kandi ifasha mu kuvura inzoka zo mu nda,
Indwara zizahaza cyane ibihaha nka asima
Birababaje kubona ugomba gutakaza amahirwe nkaya. 
Ndibaza impamvu  ngamije yangiriye neza vuba aha. 
Nubwo abaturage bari impunzi,
bobo badashira imbere ineza y'umuntu
bityo teganya mbere, nurangiza utangire
Twahagurutse duseka ndetse dufatanye ibiganza
atuma umuntu ashobora kuvuga ibimuri ku mutima 
ukamwereka ko ushyigikiye ibyemezo bye
kubahana, kwihanganirana, guhana imbabazi,
Nabishima Yayafashishaga Abatishoboye rwose
Ikinyamakuru The Washington Post cyo muri Amerika 
bityo bigafasha mu kurwanya umubyibuho
maze babaha ibishyimbo gusa
Iyi ni inkuru y’ako kanyoni,
Nzobya amaze kubyumva arahaguruka 
Nibyiza kuba ibyiringiro no kwibeshya kuruta kuba pessimist no kuba ukuri. (erikspen)
u Rwanda narwo ruri mu ho bifuje
icyakora ibyo ntibisobanura kuyibegurira 
bakabijyaho inama anababwira
nte muzindutsi we cyene weteshye umunsi mutime w’undi
Umukobwa naguhakanira ku munsi wa mbere
yashituwe na maganatanu Frw yashyizemo 
dore amwe mu mafunguro y’ibanze waha umwana muto
Kubaka urugo ni ugufata inshingano
kuko cinema yari imaze kuzamo amafaranga ,
Ibi ni byo bitotsi tugubwamo neza iyo twarushye.
Malariya kuko uwashaka kuyirwanya wenyine yaba yibeshya
Turabizi mwene se kuruta uko yiyizi. 
ruba rwiza cyane kuruta urw’abahorana
bikaba byatuma adatera inda
Imibare y’ubwandu bushya bwa Coronavirus
nk'uko ikinyamakuru The Citizen gikomeza kibivuga.
Nanjye nishwe n’izuba, 
Buhoro buhoro natangiye kubona ko namwumvise nabi. 
mu bikorwa by’ubwitange bugamije gukumira icyorezo 
Angeline Usanase bamusanzemo kanseri, 
Mwumvishe ko ari ingenzi kuri wowe
aho izina rye ryagaragaye mu bushakashatsi bwinshi
Umugore we yaje aho bakoreraga imyitozo
ese ibihugu bikorana bite
…muri make Ntwari yifuje ko tujya turyamana
twika igihugu musaza dore byakomeye 
ingabo za Farawo zibatuze Kandi nta nzira
abatwambaye nabi, abadahana intera
Kuki naguhamagaye hano
umwe mu bari kumwe nabo yaburiwe irengero
Nubwo bimeze gutyo ariko biracyashoboka
hakaba n’ubwo umukunzi wawe agusuga 
Nahitamo kuguma murugo kuruta kujya mu rugendo shuri.
miliyoni enye z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
ntabwo yavuze niba ari mu bakorerabushake ba mbere 
Sinshobora kubimenya keretse ubimbwiye
umubyeyi wanjye azi ko afite umuhungu i Kigali
z’umuco w’u Rwanda hagamijwe iterambere 
ineza ye ntawe utarigeze ayifuza,
ariko icyampa abantu bose bakabisoma 
ruzatuganya toni mirongo itatu ku munsi
“Gukaraba intoki kenshi gashoboka , kwirinda kuramukanya,
Gasuku rekera aho guteza ibibazo
Ndumva nsohotse aho kuguma murugo uyu munsi. 
uko aganira n’umuryango we, 
Bimaze umunsigaragara ko gusobanura umuco bitoroshye; 
Cyangwa waramukoreye uramwambura uracika 
Incamake y’amateka yuwo muhanzi
nijye ushinzwe gukurikirana ko amabwiriza ashyirwa mu bikorwa.
ku myaka ye mirongo itandatu 
uko bekwiye kwitwere neze
buri kimwe ntekereza  nicyo
yari njye ubifuriza kugira ubuzima buzira kanseri
imbunda zirambitse iruhande rwabo
ukava mukazi gusa ntukurikiranwe n’inkiko.
kuko ngo impamvu nyayo ari  iyi 
ibitekerezo by’abaturage bigera kuri  bitanu
Mfite inshuti ikora kuri iryo duka. 
Jackie abara nabi maze agasimbuka
mu rwego rwo umunsibefeshe 
Akaba aribyo bifasha umubiri mu kwirinda 
yuma y’iminsi ibiri gusa
Nyogokuru yampaye ibirenze ibyo nashakaga. 
Uko ni ko byagendekeye uwo umugabo
iyo mbonye nk’amafaranga magana biri 
ubuzima bwa buri munsi 
kandi ubuzima bubakomereye bitavugwa
gishobora gutuma ingamba zashyiriweho zitubahirizwa
uko umugabo mwiza agomba kumera 
Azi neza kuruta gukoresha amafaranga ye yose kumyenda. 
umunyamakuru wanditse iyi nkuru yisubireho kweli
nk’uko Ashuri hazigukojeje banyiraho
cyane ko ari icyorezo gikwirakwizwa na “bacteria” 
baragenda bagahita babwira abakobwa ko babakunda
uburere butangirwa mu muryango
abasenga nabo bajya gusenga
abantu batubonaga bose bahitaga bibwira akantu
Kubyibaza birumvikana cyane rwose 
ko kuba bamaze umwaka badahabwa inkunga 
Turashimira dogiteri tedros nabandi bakomeje kutugenda imbere
Twarayitumije n’ubu ntiturayibona.
bigaragaza intambwe ikomeye mu rugendo rwacu
no kugiha amabwiriza gikurikiza
Icyorezo cumi n,icyenda
mu Kagali ka Mbugangali.
bamaze kuhava bacyurwa n'ibihugu byabo
Imibare irerekana ko imibereho yacu iri hejuru. 
Ariko abantu banjye baguranye icyubahiro cyabo
ndamwubaha niyo mpamvu namwiganye
Nkuko twabibonye igipimo cy’isukari kirimo si kinini,
yari ibaye imfabusa bitewe n’ihungabana 
bazajya bakora telefone zirenga igihumbi ku kwezi
ukabona guhindura n’urundi ruhande
imibare y'ikigo cy'igihugu cy'ubuzima
Ibyo bagezeho nibiki ubwo
wakoza ntibishireho ukaguma ukabibonaho
Gnomes irazengurutse umubiri kandi irishimye
bayobya amahanga nibihugu bishaka kwirengera
akunyu gake kaba gahagije
Nyuma rero yo gufata igihe kinini yiga ku mico gakondo
akunda umusore uzi gukunda cyane
uburere umuntu erebuhebwe ne we ekegire uruhere
ndetse n’uko nzishyura inzu
Ariko rero nubwo ukomeza kumbwira 
Rya amafi rimwe mu cyumweru
gukungahara kuri vitamin A 
urubuga ruba rwandika ku mibanire rubitangaza.
Mukamurenzi B. we avuga ko byacitse
buvuga ko uko utu dukoko turi kwigaranzura uyu muti
