Abana baba bakeneye ubayobora.
Dore ko ubwo uwangizaga inka ze bavugaga ko amara inka z'umwami.
abakorerabushake tuyobowe n’umuryango mpuzamahanga,
kuko buri wese yaharaniraga kuzagororerwa ibya Macigata.
ariko Abimukira bashishoza niba hari itandukanyirizo
nk’uko giteganywa n’itegeko rigenga umurimo
muri laboratoire uko iyo virusi iteye,
tariki ya icyenda Gashyantere

buri munsi mbere yo kujya ku kazi,

yamenye ko yaburiwe irengero umwana
kuko yari amaze kugabirwa byose

azamufasha kwihanganira hanze yo munda ya nyina.
Mugize neza cyane rwose ,
ntebe y’ Inteko Nyerwende y’Ururimi n’Umuco

ntabuhanga na buke afite mu kurapa

bigatuma uteka isombe zisukuye 
umutako mwiza wari uriho Nelson na Brendah

ko nta dupfukamunwa n'uturindantoki bambaye

ntakita ku rugo, yewe ndabona ngiye gusenya!”
amafaranga wampaye niyo nadodeshejemo iri kote,

yakoreshejwe muri iki gitabo.
“Iyo mpanze ikintu gishya biranshimisha

umutungo navuga ukomeye nakuyemo
Umwe uvuga ko akora muri 'business' y'imiti
Ubumenyi wakuye mu ishuri bwagufashije iki

bitagombye kujya kuyikura ahandi
ni mpuzamatorero w’abakorerabushake
ku misozi ya Mont Kigali
ko icyo aricyo cye bwite
umunsi bibazo bya benshi mu bagize umuryango w’abantu
Nitoje gukora akazi kose mbonye, 
Nkurikije uko mbizi, ibaruwa yawe iri munsi yicyo gitabo. 
Ntabwo yari afite ikinyabupfura cyo kwemera ko yibeshye. 
bakenera indyo yuzuye igizwe n’imboga,
ngo amuhumurize ndetse anamuhoze amarira
ububabare bwarwo bumara amasegonda make cyane
nkorenyembege ekoreshe esibe emefoto yose
Birashobora kuba ahakurikira
no gukorera umunsiri gahunda.

bityo bagatunga neza imiryango yabo.
nibwo nibutse ko ari we wenyine nsigaranye
Hari isomo rirebana no kumenyakanisha ibikorwa
ibyo dukoresha mu guteka bisanzwe
mfite ikibazo nshaka kubagishaho inama 
hagati yawe n’umukunzi wawe,
Ntabwo umuburira akanya namba
ahantu ikunda kwiganza hirya no hino mu gihugu.
Mariko akunda kuza hano buri mwaka kumunsi w'amavuko

ibye byaba ari byiza kurenza ibyawe
ndetse nibindi byinshi byo kuvuga aho bidatengushye rwose ....

iyo mwasabaga inyubako zo kubamo

cyangwa aho wagiye usaturwa n’izuba

dufatanye buri wese abe umujyanama wa mugenzi we.”

mu buryo butandukanye

uwo munezero ubonerwa mu mibonano mpuzabitsina,

inkuru ye iracyasomwa na bugingo nubu
kuko yagiye ibatwara ibintu,
ikanafasha mu ikorwa ry’ingufu
Abasare bangahe bari mu bwato bwarohamye? 
Icyumba cy'ishuri cyari urusaku cyane sinigeze numva izina ryanjye ryitwa. 
Ushobora gusinzira hano igihe gito niba ubishaka 
Ibi nabyo bikagira ingaruka ku mutekano w’Isi,
Nabonaga Mama yishimye cyane 
ku buryo hazakingirwa nibura mirongo itadatu kwijana 
no mu ngeso zihutaza indangagaciro
bari bafite ibibazo byo kubura umwuka
“Ba mubi Cyangwa uhindure imyifatire yawe
Nta mwana wiga, nta mugore tukigira 
Sabine mwihorere sha Kokona we
kuki umwijima utavugwa cyane, 
zishobora guhungabanya umutekano w’umuntu 
ntagiye kure mu bitekerezo.
Gutakaza ibiro ku buryo bwihuse
cyangwa niba bukeye umwifurize umunsi mwiza.
Ariko kutitabira ibintu byangiriye akamaro!
Nti : „Uri umwari umwe wazinyoye, , 
dukorana n’amabanki atandukanye
Rukundo n’abana be nabahanga
ariko iyo bibayeho ko umwe ajya kure y’undi 
bukomeze gutyo nze umunsibone emenote 
Ibi byateje imbere uburyo bwo gupima 
Niba wifuza gutakaza ibiro 
Yazindutse ambwira ko yumwva atameze neza
wenda bo bari kubishyuza
bukaba na bwo bwifashishwa
Umva, nta nubwo ari akajisho

Kugerageza kwisanisha n’umukiriya
amahame yagendeyeho akora iyo kamera. 
ngo Ndi agatama ka Yesu”!

ku wa Kabiri ryahise rijya mu Murenge wa Bugeshi, Akagari ka Rusiza
abihugu harimo  nka Saudi Arabia.

usanganywe amagambo y’ibitandampaka

uko umusanzu wange waba ungana kose.

ibibazo byagiye bigaragara mu mikino y’amahirwe
Gukubita umwana kuko akoresha imoso ni bibi
Dore uko urutonde rukurikirana 
atari yataha ngo ahishe ibishyimbo
ubundi ni uburyo twari dusanzwe dukoresha 
noneho arihuta arabegera cyane
abakinnyi bakomeye muri Cinema nka Amitabh Bachchan
ikaba ishobora gukorwamo nibindi bitandukanye
kugira ngo barebe isura  yawe gusa 
byamuviriyemo kwirukanwa mu ishuri, 
kuko ndumva mfite inyota.
Magana arindwi mirongo ine nakarindwi
mu muziki wabo uryoheye amatwi. 
ubunyobwa bugashya noneho ukavanga
mu iterambere ry’igihugu cyacu

mubushobozi buke mfite maze ntangiza uwo mushinga

inyamaswa ntizishobora kwanduza abantu ubwo buheri

bitewe n’ibyo warose urya.

n'ubundi bariya bashenzi baransagariye

nk’abandi kandi bakikuramo iyo mico

Imibare igaragaza ko umubare w’abarwara Malaria 
Ndashaka kuvugana numuntu ubishinzwe hano 
imidugudu ye yarahiye ari nta muturage ukiyirimo
imwe mu ndwara zimaze igihe kirekire kandi ziha inkumbi - mu kiringo kitari kure.
bityo rero ngo si ngombwa kujya mu mitsi.
"Ese yari Umwanditsi?" umwe arabaza
akura Mu bwonko vuba
Bikagira uruhare ku myitwarire yawe ,uwo uriwe, 
bagakurikiranwa n’ababana n’abagore babo.
poroteyine ndetse n’umunyungugu wa fosifore

rwo kuva aho zasohorewe 
hagati y’igice cy’iburyo cy’ubwonko n’icy’ibumoso,
Kugira ubuzima bisobanura kugubwa neza,
Umuryango wanjye ni uw'ingenzi kuri njye kuruta akazi kanjye. 
bikaba bibonekamo imbaraga calories
ndetse ni naho atangira kwigana ibyo abonye ukora.
umuntu ashobora gucura icyuma
kuko byangiza umwana wabo nabo ubwabo.
Yego… Nabwirijwe kuva mu mutima wawe umenetse;
bitewe n’abo wifuza kugaburira,
Ariko, ukuri ni uko bishoboka
ivuge ko heri ebentu bene bishwe,
yebeye Indeshyikirwe mu bikorwe byo umunsirwenye ibize
ni nk’aho byose byatwikiriwe n’ibyishimo

ufite nimero y’indangamuntu yawe

bishobora kuba byabona inkingo bikaba byanaziduha,
ngo mumfashe gufata umwanzuro ukwiriye.

ubu byabaye iminota itanu, 
no kubafasha kubaho kugira ngo bahindure ubuzima.

Aho kwiheba, birashoboka ko numva namwanze. (blay_paul)
Iyi kalisiyumu ishobora no kujya mu mijyana
ahubwo ahabwe ubungingo buhoraho
kandi byongera umubare w’abaturage, 
mu rwego rw'ubwikorezi mu ndege. 
Abo bana Bagezeyo barashoberwa
abaha raporo ko agaburira abana 
yakoze igitaramo cy’amateka mu Rwanda
Komereza aho ntuzacike intege kubera amagambo y'abantu
nubwo nta mibare igaragazwa,
impano ye ikomeza gukura,
Ibi bigafasha igogorwa kugenda neza, 
kugira umutima ukomeye kandi ukeye:
harimo kuvuka kw’abakinnyi bibyamamare kuri ubu

ikintu kitemerewe ko bagikoraho kuko kiba gi fi te,
Minisitiri w’Urubyiruko n’umuco, 
noneho uzakomeza ururimi rwinshi

nyuma y'ibi byemezo yasohoye itangazo 
aribwira ati reka mpanyure mbavumbe

ububabare umugore utwite agira
Ibi bishobora gufasha cyane abarwayi ba diyabete
kuko nta barwayi ba coronavirus bagihari.

ubu bagikomeje no kunza mu ntekerezo.
bititaye ku kazi yakoze

uwo Ni umugabo wubatse,

nubwo gutegura isosi y’isambaza ari ibintu bitagoye,
biba byiza iyo ari umweru
ariko bikanga bikaba iby’ubusa,
umenya nta n’ikindi cyabaga mu mutwe wa Kamaliza.
muri shampiyona y'icyiciro cya mbere muri Togo
itera abayikora guhora banezerewe.
Mumbabarire ariko, mwangiriye neza kuntera agasanduku? 
mu rugendo rwacu rwo kugera ku bikorerwa mu Rwanda
Yesu yashoje uwo mugani 
hari n’ibindi bikoresho byinshi 
uhabwa imiti ya antibiyotike.
Turakangurira buri wese gukurikiza amabwiriza 
mu kwitabira ibikorwa nk’ubukwe, ibiriyo, 
Abashakashatsi bavuga ko bari gushaka izindi mbuto nshya

bigusaba ko ushyira muri iyo mashini
mu gihe nta nshuro n’imwe ubonye
nta n'uburyo yabisiga bitamugezeho

ndetse n’ubushyuhe bw’umubiri bukagabanuka.

bitewe n’icyo umuntu wese ashingiraho

ihatanze indi ikahaborera; imvugo niyo ngiro.

birananira gutsindira  Gutakaza ego-yibanze,
bigaragara neza, uhereye ku kuremwa kw’isi,
ku ifunguro rya mu gitondo

n’ubwo ababikora binezeza bibagiraho ingaruka

cyane cyane abanza n’ayisumbuye 
wikwirirwa ujya kure rwose
Yaje kare gato kurenza uko yari asanzwe abikora. 
Gukundwa, gusobanuka no kwitabwaho
ikaba ihora ifunguye kuri ba mukerarugendo 
Intumwa zigenda ubutarora inyuma
uwari muri urwo rugo wese yari yishimye.
ku buryo buhoraho nk’iza pondezi
Mwanashira kuri metero zirenze izo
kendi beminuze umunsiko ne bo bereshoboye.

Inteko Izirikana, Indangamanota z’ingenzi mu muco w’u Bururu
uburyo byacamo akazi ukakabona
abafite ubumuga bwo umunsitabona  
Zikungahaye ku kinyabutabire cyitwa quercetin
nibura muri Werurwe bibiri na makumyabiri na rimwe.
zishobora kuza mu izabukuru
mu gihe abantu bo mu gihugu bahunze
ngo bikorere ibyo bashaka
gukoresha agakingirizo ntibabikozwa burya
ishotora ka kanyoni ininura 
biri hejuru ya mirongo irindwi na bitanu
abenshi bakaba ari abana.
twatangira kurasana tukiri ku nkiko,
ntuzahite ucika intege ku ikubitiro
Iyi ndirimbo yayisohoye mu mwaka wa bibiri numunani
Icyemezo cy’amashuri wize kiriho umukono wa noteri
Amagambo meza yari yambwiye 
Benishyaka yabeshye abapolisi aho yari ari muri kiriya gihe. 
ubushakashatsi bwaba bwarakozwe ku isukari
kugira ngo tubashe kugeza ku Banyarwanda ibyiza
wapi man. Nje kubaramutsa gusa

abantu bazayumva bajye babaza uko byagenze”

u Rwanda rwemeje ko umurwayi wa mbere
Mbega amasoni no kwicira uburanza.
ndetse n’amasake azajya avuka, 
urugendo rwo guha Isi urukingo rwa Coronavirus
Mu Rwanda usanga abandikisha akaboko kw
bigireho bityo byezetume tuterengize dutekereze gukore mume
ni ugufata icyaha ukacyohereza ahandi hantu
Uwase avuga ko yakuze atozwa n’iwabo kubaha
bamwe badaha abana babo urugero rwiza 
Irinde igihe ni iki kuko bose bararwaye
kwitanga kandi biri mu murage wacu
uriya muntu akunda gusetsa mu buryo bwe
Sinigeze menya ko bwije cyane. 
iki gihe ntabwo yabwiye ubugingo,
kandi bituma uhinduka umwizerwa kuri we 
ndacyeka ko haza kuvamo amasezerano yihariye,
kibi yatanze umurozi gupfa
bifatanya mu gutuma umutima ukora neza
abwira wa mugore Kibero cy ‘Ubukombe, 
ibyamubayeho uwo munsi byari bigiye gutuma abireka burundu
agira at: “Muzi neza ukuntu gutwika ikintu icyo ari cyo cyose byangiza ikirere

Ubusazi bwo kuvanga  umutungo
kuva mbere na nyuma y’ubwigenge

cg se ukazajya umugurira amata atarimo lactose
Abambere bageragerezwaho urwo rukingo
wari waberewe cyane n’imicyenyero
Hanyuma mukore raporo tuzabiumunsirikirana.”
Mu ngofero zidasanzwe hamwe n'umukandara mugari
Isoko yo kumarana aka kababaro umwaka wose,
Abo bahawe urwo rukingo
ndetse n’ibyiza byayo kuri we nk’umugore utwite,
ku muntu ufite imbaraga
Ahubwo munezezwe n’uko mufatanije imibabaro
ndetse ni ibitega bitobotse bitabasha gukomeza amazi
akaba yahera umwuka icyo gihe.
ukunzwe cyane witirirwa fromage
gusa gukora pate yayo yo biroroha cyane 
biyongerera amahirwe yo kuba yakomera cyane 
ntugire umuze kendi ntuhegerike umutime. 
kubera ubwoba bw’uko basabwa ruswa
kujya muri 'piscine' igihe cyose irimo uwo muti
baza kuturwanirira no kuturinda. 
Muri ibi bihe uteg’amatwi
ku ngoma ya Kigeli wa wa gatanu Rwabugiri, 
ubu nonaha niba ushaka kuzakira
Ntabwo nemera ko ibi bifata igihe kinini. 
amashuri ya leta n’afashwa na leta
kuko nawe yabonye intambara ze
abakobwa babiri n’abahungu babiri
baba bategereje kuzarambiriza ku mugabo
umwe mu bakoze ico cegeranyo akomoka muri Tanzania
ebyiri cyangwa izirenze uwo mubare noneho ukube n’abafite izishaje bose bari mu gihugu
batangiye kubona ko iki cyorezo kigiye kuneshwa,
cyangwa se agahitamo gukora imirimo ibiri icyarimwe
maze Papa Nelson ahita avuga,
Yagendaga yihuta cyane ku buryo atashoboraga kumukomeza. 
Indangagaciro na kirazira zatoranijwe 
ubone kongeramo inyanya uzireke zibire

Kera kukabona byari ingorabahizi
bivuze kubyara no kurera
mu kubongerera ubushobozi mu bushabitsi bwabo
muri Nyamagabe habonetse abantu batanu

ivuga ko hamaze kuboneka

ntamenye ko asubiye aho avuye
Igitera The Ben ishema rikomeye
burya abantu muraruhije cyane
umukunzi we wa cyera atazigera yibagirwa.

Harimo itizabuntu kubantu bataziicyo bakora
igihe kigeze namusabye ko tubireka

Magufuli yatangaje ko coronavirus yashize muri Tanzania
batanga amafaranga y’inguzanyo
Amahanga bivuze ibihugu bindi bitari aho uvuka
ahisha ababyeyi be yabigeraho
zifasha mu ikoreshwa ry’ibinure mu mubiri
mwene nyirakuru ntabwo ari hano, ndababaye rwose. 
ntiyishima kuko uwarihiraga mushiki wanjye muto

agace gafatwa nk'izingiro ry'iyi virus
newe ntecyo ubone cyo gukore
bakajya gushakisha ibibatunga 
ibyo nzabyumva ndetse nzanabikurikiza
kandi anabonekamo vitamini B zinyuranye, 
ni icyorezo cyatumye abantu bita ku isuku n’ibindi byiza.

bishingiye ku bana batunaniye n’ibindi,
na Bosco atangira kwizera ko atazongera kumubona

mu mubiri biboneka bimazemo igihe

Bimukorera neza ko yabuze gari ya moshi ya nyuma. 
Aba bahinzi bavuga ko mu masezerano bari bafite 
nsigarana na nuwo nitaga Papa 
na we akamubwira ko atayazi kandi atayaheruka.
harimo urukundo no kumuterura
kandi bakababwira uko biri 
ko hari bagenzi be batangiranye urugendo
Tora akazi ukunda kandi ukora bizasa nkibyoroshye. 
Igice cy’urukuta runini cya Jiankou, 
gira amahoro muvandimwe wanjye
ntabwo iri muri ibyo bihugu.
”.Amushyira mu itorero,arasimbuka aba umuhanga cyane
yatangiye kwikoma cyane Rwamagana
Nelson atera intambwe amusanga 
Ubutwari bujyana n’ishyaka ryo gukurikirana
nurangiza uvange neza, maze upfundikire.
Muri rusange ari mu batanze imipira myinshi
muco n’indengemenote z’Ebenyerwende
bigatuma afata uwo mugenzi we yamuhaye 
Sinzi impamvu byantwaye igihe kirekire. 
Nuburyo bwo gusohoka hanze yinzangano
zikaba zarabakujije zikabageza mu myaka ijana
amagambo y’urukundo  arafasha 
kandi ubu bakaba babikurikirana
ikinyuranyo cy’ibyo ni cyo kibaho
iyo ari inshishi n’amasazi 
n’aba bose mujya mwumva 
Nubona inzu ye, uzamenye ko ari umukene. 
Laboratwari nk'iyi yo muri Hungary
Hey, Ubu Buzima bwo mu gasozi
Uburyo umugabo yita ku mwana we bifasha umwana,
Ubwo rero nize kutabiha umwanya
cyangwa byibura benshi muritwe turabishoboye.
Icyo gihe hakoreshwaga udukoze mu mara y’inyamaswa. 
Kandi humura, imihango iza mu buryo ubasha kubibona
inkoni yo kwiyitirira ibendera ryaryo
Kuki wowe na njye iyi mvururu mbi?
Umwanya ukikije isi yose
Abakobwa bimpanga barasa cyane kuburyo ntashobora kubwira umwe murundi. 
akagira amahirwe akagendera ku bandi,
Nyuma yo kubyangiriza mu ruhame,
ngango yashakaga kumenya uko Mariya yari umukire cyane. 
umuganga uvura indwara z’abagore
byatumye haboneka icyizere cyane
ni kimwe mu bishobora kurinda ikwirakwira 
gusa aha imboni ye iba itaragaragara.
uyu mushinga, nk’uko twabigaragaje ufite intego ebyiri
mu gihe cy'ihungabana rikomeye ry'ubukungu 
Tugumane kuko iki sicyo gihe cyawe
bakarona imirimo yose yo mu rugo. 
umwana aba ashaka kugira uruhare mu mirimo runaka,
ibyivugo byari byinshi, akaziki gato gatuje,
atuye mu Karere ka Rubavu.
Ntawabura kuvuga ko ubuzima bwigihugu bufite ubuzima bwiza kuruta ubuzima bwumujyi. 
Ingorane z’ufite ubumuga
betendukenye bebe ebenyepolitike, ebiheye Imene,
witezwe kubaho kubera ukudahaza kw'ibitanda by'abarwayi.
byo muri Aziya y'amajyepfo ashyira i burasirazuba.
aho dukura iki kinyabutabire cya phosphorus 
avuga ko ahanini iki kibazo gituruka mu mitekereze
ko hari ikabije kwambika umuntu ubusa
Ariko nubwo hari byinshi byakomeje guhwihwiswa cyane

inyamaswa zihitamo kuba aho zishaka,
gikorwa kurusha ibindi kw’isi

kurenza ubudakoresha imisemburo

nkabandi bose mumibereho yanjye bakomeje ubuzima bwabo bwakazi
Lithium ni bumwe mu bwoko bw’amabuye y’agaciro 
mu gihugu ehehembwe Isibo
Ugomba gukomeza kumwereka ko uri umugabo

njye nicyo nkwifuriza nicyiza rwose

abashaka impano yawe itera imbere
amaherezo ukazasanga ni inyongezo iri muri theorie 
Udukombe dutatu ku munsi 
Batanga ifunguro ryiza cyane muri iyo resitora. 
yarigendeye ajya mu kindi gihugu

kiri no mu byakira abagenzi benshi ku Isi
icyo wamenya n’uko amurusha
ushobora kumva utameze neza

abakorerabushake bababaye cyane
two mu rwego rwa elegitoroniki
muganga mukuru yaravuze ko hari iyo ndwara y'ubuheri

umunsibunze imitime, umutime usobetse emegenye
Nanga iyo abantu birata
Ibyibukwa cyane ni mu mwaka wa bibiri na kabiri

Dufite amasaha atarenze abiri kugeza igihe ntarengwa.

ahubwo hakora ubw’ishyirahamwe

ubwiza bwo bwari bwarikubye kabiri.

abantu benshi bazwi cyane ku isi

umurenge wa Kanyinya mu karere ka Nyarugenge,
ati Muraho neza, Imana ibarinde 
amafaranga yo gutegura umushinga, 
ntaruhare babigizemo ngo abashoferi bigaragambye.
amasoko azongera gufungura yose
Reba neza aho ugiye gukandagira.
yongerera ingufu ubudahangarwa bw’umubiri 
ikibaye cyose barakidushinja nukuri
ishobora kumenya ahantu hari ibisasu 
zimaze kwinjira nk’amafaranga yo gusaba impushya.
bigatuma hari benshi bikomeretsa
Indimu ifasha mu bijyanye n’umuvuduko w’amaraso 
ikirenga cya mbere mu gishanga
Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda yakomeje 
beremwenge beremucuneguze 
uwo bavuga ngo arakize usanga afite Fuso imwe
kubaho mu guhora basabana imbabazi 
mu burebure bwa buri kagufa
umushinga we wari ukwandikira indirimbo abahanzi
namukunzu ubwo ntazi icyo mukundi 
Dufite iminota itarenze itatu mbere yuko firime itangira. 
naho yakurikiye abagemu ba se.
Ibintu birasa nkubu nkuko byari bimeze mbere. (kebukebu)
iyo ubirangije ufata amavuta menshi ukayacamutsa
kugira ngo iyo virusi niba iriho ibashe gupfa.
Cyakora basobanurira burugadiye w'i Burayi ko barengana
hagakurikiraho umugore wawe
zisakare kandi zimakazwe mu Gihugu hose 
impamvu impuruza ya Dr Li yirengagijwe
kwimekeze te uruhere muri gehunde
avuka mu muryango w’abana bane
Birakwiye kandi nanjye biranejeje
umuhanga mu bya siyansi wa mbere ku isi
Kuki tugomba kuza kare cyane  ibaze nawe koko
nyuma y’igitangaza cyo ku nyanja itukura.
gusa, bahendwa n’ibyambarwa.
ibihugu isigaranye by'inshuti
Uko witwara imbere y’abagore n’abakobwa
Cyamunara y’ubutaka bwubatsweho inzu 
Nizera ko byose bizaba byiza. 
kandi bingeri nyinshi

atagira umwitaho bamujyana kwa muganga

ubucuti buri hagati yabo,

Uyu mukobwa amenyerewe mu kazi k’itangazamakuru 
Yatoranyijwe mu ikipe ya kabiri y’abakinnyi bashya
Amaso ayahanze i Roma
amasaha akomeza kwicuma butwiriraho,
araboneza yigira iwabo kwa Gihanga.
umunsiko nte buzime tweri dufite
ukongeramo ibirayi na tungurusumu.

kugeza ubwo bemerewe umugeni.
uburyo ushobora gusoma message

kuko nyina nta bushobozi yari afite.

nk’abantu bafite indwara karande zitandukanye,

Twifuzaga ko umenya ko tubitayeho. 
Usanga abantu bakundana bari kure,
igaragaza ibihaha by'uwo murwayi 
bibasaba y’uko bagomba kubanza kuyiyungurura
Sinamenya niba atebya cyangwa avuga ukuri.
Nubwo yumvaga ko ari umuntu umuhamagaye
ahubwo ngo amakuru yagiye ayahabwa na bamwe
Lete y’u Rwende yeshyizeho centeleli nyinshi
Nta nubwo nakwirirwa mbitekerezaho rwose.

uyu mukobwa aherutse kugaragara muri Filime Umuturanyi

nta n’ibinini nanyweye pe
abo dusangiye Gakondo twitana bamwana
Yego rwose ndaje mukanya
Yasezeranije imbata ko bazabohorwa. 
Ibyangombwa by’Abanyarwanda bitaga ibuku
imwe muriyo yari yasubitswe
ko umuntu wundi yitabye Imana 
ni indengemenote mpuzebentu umunsiko ubwo buzime
ari nayo mpamvu dusaba abantu gufata ingamba,
inzego zitendukenye z’umutekeno,
nta mpamvu yo guta umutwe na busa ihari
impyiko z’umwana ndetse n’umwijima birakora
kereka ari munsi y’imyaka cumi nitandatu.
kuko aba ashaka kumutungura 
nibyo bigaragaza ko atari ibintu wari wagambiriye

zishakishikiriza ibyo kurya byazo.”

sosiyete isigaye ibona ntacyo bitwaye

nk’inararibonye mu bijyanye n’amateka y’u Rwanda, 
Ibikoko bitungwa biduha ibirenze gusabana gusa. 
n’ibibazo byabaho byatuma uyahomba.
mu byatuma business yawe imenyekana.
Niba wajyaga wifuza kunanuka bikanga, 
Umukobwa muto ntajya amwenyura undi muntu utari Emily. 
Ubu bwigunge, urupfu rwabwo;
ko ndeba Rukuba ryonyine
bye bya buri munsi no mu burenganzira
ngamije arashaka iyo pome kuburyo adashobora kwihanganira. 
naho abakirwaye ni magana ne na mirongo irindwi 
utegura amagarama magana tandatu y’inyama ziseye
umwalimu wamashuri abanza arakora cyane

ni impuzandengo ya Kilogarama ebyiri nibice birindwi
ubufasha kuri ubu bakaba barize 
kuko yumvaga ari we ntandaro

no kuvura indwara ya kanseri,

batarinze kwifashisha izo nzitiramibu kuko si byo yagenewe”.
ubundi namenyanye na we duhuriyeaha

instgram n’izindi usanga ari indirimbo 
ku ruhande rw’umuhungu,
iyo misoro ituma ibintu bihenda

ukuboko kwe kwari kwizingiye mu kwanjye

imbuto n’imboga ziba muri iki cyiciro

Nari mwiza kandi mfite ikimero 
nabwo cyari cyahitanye abarenga mirongo irindwi
mwene se arenga ku masezerano arenze ayo yubahiriza. 
banyweye amazi menshi na tungurusumu 
iyo se w’umwana yagaragaje amwishimira 
zitunze benshi bari bamaze iminsi batakamba
icyo kigo cyarabinenze cyane,

burya koko  murukundo wakwibohora

yebe iki cyorezo cyengwe emeteke; 
wari usanzwe aryamanye n’umugore we;

n’umutwe we getenu mu ngingo ye kebiri

rigashushanya uurumuke n’uuzima
byarahinduwe mu Kilatini bikuwe mu Cyarabu.

Kuki se wamurekeye ku irembo
Sinshobora kukubwira uburyo nduhutse bintera kumva.

bagomba kunywa amata atarimo lactose,
usobanura uburyo abanyeshuri bahiga barenganye
kugirango ubukwe buzabashe kugenda neza.
ibi byose biradusaba kwitonda
mu gihe barimo gutereta birabagora
bishobora guturuka ku guhararukwana kw’abashaknye
bakazikuba kabiri icyiciro cya kabiri kirangiye

ngo ankize ibikomere nari mfite ku mutima.”

Karirekinyana avuga ati: "Abo ni abantu batarabona 
Dj ira yaramusuhuje, ahita afata umugozi 
ko udashobora kubaho adahari , n’ibindi.
nyamara abazibigishije bari bazi impamvu babikora,
batagira ibyo bangiza nabi
Uwo mugabo asanzwe akekwaho gucuruza ibiyobyabwenge,
eriko kiterenze imyeke ibiri, n’ihezebu y’emeferenge
nibe murwende ijenishe rinini eri ebehinzi n’eborozi 
hari iby’ingenzi ugomba kuzirikana
ku muryango w’umusore bazarushinga
Nta mwana afite, ariko usibye ko abaho neza. 
Iyo ufite urumuri ntebwo rumurikire
akaba afite impamyabumenyi yo ku rwego rwa Azero
arasuzumwa, asanganwa iyo ndwara
Gukorera umunsi gihe ukorera umunsi gihe
kugura za televiziyo n’amafatabuguzi ku mashene atandukanye
n’umwana ukiri mu nda ashobora gusepfura.
mu gihe cy’ukwezi gusa
Bibaye inshuro eshatu kugeza ubu. 
Uzi mwene muyombano neza kurusha buri wese muri twe. 
kandi ukoresha uburyo butandukanye 
Umubiri w’umwana ukomeza kubika amavuta 
yatuma urenga umuhanda cyane 
Umuganga wakundaga kugasoma yaragiye
inkuru yasohotse mu kinyamakuru
Nyuma y’umugambi wo guhirika ubutegetsi 
ufite nimero enye mu irushanwa 
Sembagare bimubera umutwaro;
tukinanura tugakomeza urugendo tuvamo,
uko umuntu akunda kunywa itabi 
bihuza indangagaciro nyinshi zitandukanya umuntu n’undi,
afatanywe ikiro cy’ifu cya cocaine
Amakuru avuga ko perezida yishwe yarabatangaje. 
n'ubuswa burimo kuba hanzaha?
